Ms. Fatoumata (seated at the far right in the photo with her hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is 52 years old, married, and a mother of four children (a boy and three girls). She purchases food items, such as such as onions, rice, and spices, and sells them at her stall in the village. This is a business she has been in for five years. 

With this loan, she intends to stock up on goods from the weekly markets in the area in order to sell them retail at her stall:
- 2 sacks of rice at 13,000 francs each
- 1 sack of onions at 10,000 francs
- spices at 15,000 francs

After deducting the transportation costs from her sales, she ends up with a net profit of 7,000 francs CFA for every three days of work. 

The profits from her business will enable her to save money and to cover some of the day-to-day expenses and her children's schooling costs.

loans.use: to stock up from weekly markets in the area to resell at her stall: rice, onions, spices.

loans.name: Grupo Triunfador Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal el Triunfador está conformado por doce integrantes, todas madres solteras con 27 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Ellas son originarias del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadora, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudieron cursar sus estudio, y se vieron obligadas a trabajar desde temprana edad para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. Por lo cual lucha día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a  sus hijos. 

Gracia a su espíritu y sus ganas de salir adelante Maryuri es la coordinadora del banco comunal El Triunfador y  tiene por actividad económica la una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación, una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como sobre de café, caja de fósforos, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, detergente, jabón. Jugos.  El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El banco comunal El Triunfador agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The 'Triunfador' community bank has 12 members.  They are all single mothers and, between them, they have 27 children in their care.  They are all from El Sauce, in the north of the country.  They are noted for being hard-working, responsible and having a desire to improve themselves.  Unfortunately, owing to a lack of financial resources, they couldn't complete their schooling.  They had to work from a young age in order to help with their household expenses.  For this reason, they are working hard every day so that they can provide a better future for their own children.

Thanks to her strong spirit and her desire to make progress, Maryuri is the coordinator of the Triunfador bank.  Her business is a 'pulperia' which is located in her home.  A 'pulperia' is a small store that sells products in small quantities such as coffee sachets, boxes of matches, rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, soap and juice.  Maryuri will use this loan to increase her working capital and stock her store with food products so that, in the not-so-distant-future, she will be able to make more income.  The Triunfador community bank are grateful for the help that Kiva lenders give to people with limited resources in poor countries such as Nicaragua so that they can earn a decent living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her store with coffee sachets, boxes of matches, rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, soap and juice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase charcoal and firewood.

loans.name: Blanca Margarita

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 56 años de edad es divorciada vive con los hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Blanca se dedica al cuidado de niños es educadora  Comunitaria, además les da clase de manualidades.

Solicita el crédito para comprar materiales para la actividad de manualidades fomix,  Cartulina, juegos didácticos, pelotas. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar de contado y a precios más bajos. Las compras las realizará en Guaranda.

El sueño es ayudar a los niños en lo que pueda y es en la motricidad. En el tiempo libre le gusta investigar sobre motricidad para niños.
texts.en:
Blanca is 56 years old, divorced and lives with her children in the city of Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

Blanca's job is looking after children.  She is a community educator.  She also gives craft classes.

Blanca is requesting this loan to buy materials for her crafts such as craft foam and card.  She will also buy educational games, and balls.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy for cash at lower prices.  She will make her purchases in Guaranda.

Blanca's dream is to help children as best she can with their motor functions.  In her free time, she likes to research the subject of motor functions in children.

loans.use: to buy materials for her crafts such as craft foam and card.  She will also buy educational games and balls

loans.name: Ma. Jocelyn

texts.en:
Ma. Jocelyn is married with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ma. Jocelyn is 35 years old and has one child who is in school.

Ma. Jocelyn has a candy-making business in the Philippines. Ma. Jocelyn requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her business.

Ma. Jocelyn has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Ma. Jocelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en: Shiela earns a living through her hog-raising business. Shiela lives with her family in Anda, Bohol. Shiela is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise. Through this, she will be able to improve her hog-raising business and augment her income. In the future, Shiela has hopes of expanding her venture and making it a stable source of income.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Gustavo Enrique

texts.es: Don Gustavo de 62 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mas de 30 años su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, de esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografia. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Gustavo, 62 years old, has been a farmer for more than 30 years. His main crops are corn and beans. This is how he earns a living and is able to bring his household its daily bread. He plants year after year, and it is the only way he knows how to earn a living. He is a very hard-working man, honorable and responsible. He has made the decision to ask for a loan in order to buy the main farming supplies: manure, insecticide, seed, fertilizer, etc., and to improve the land where he plants his crops, which is shown in the photograph. He hopes to have favorable results, since he has no other source of income. He trusts in God that he will succeed in obtaining an abundant harvest that will allow him to continue bringing his household its daily bread.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticide, seed, fertilizer, etc

loans.name: Ulezi Group

texts.en:
Daud, who is in his early 30s, is married, with two children who go to school. For five years, he has been running two businesses, selling fresh fruits and fried chicken. He works from 4.00am (very early in the morning) to 10.00 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be Daud's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania Ltd.  He used the previous loans to increase the amount fresh fruits and to buy more chicken to fry and sell. He has successfully paid back all his loans. He used the profit to buy a bed and a TV set and to pay household expenses.  He will use this loan to buy more fresh fruits to resell and more chicken to fry and sell.  His dream is to one day be able to buy a car for his business and to build his own house.

Daud will share this loan with his loan group, Ulezi Group, with fourteen members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fruits to resell and more chicken to fry and sell.

loans.name: El Bien Comun Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatros socios emprendedores de éxitos uno de ellos es José hombre de 65 años de edad, casado con un hijo ya mayor , su negocio es la venta de leche agria al por mayor, la comercializa en su comunidad de piedra menuda ubicada en el municipio de Nindiri Masaya, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de leche, vasos descartables, cucharas descartables, sal, tortilla etc.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four partners who are successful entrepreneurs. One of them is José, a 65-year-old man, who is married with an adult son. His business is selling buttermilk wholesale. He sells this in his community of Piedra Menuda in the municipality of Nindiri Masaya. 

He will invest the loan in buying milk, disposable cups, disposable spoons, salt, tortillas etc.

loans.use: to buy cow's milk, disposable cups, disposable spoons, salt, tortillas etc.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
Doña Basilia es una mujer de 46 años de edad la cual es casada y madre de 5 hijos de los cuales los 3 mayores están casados y en hogar a parte y los dos menores los cuales están en la escuela en diferentes grados de educación viven bajo el mismo techo, ella, el esposo y sus dos hijos menores. Ella no tiene ningún grado de educación y desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la agricultura (el cultivo de café, maíz y frijoles) practicándolo hace más de 26 años gracias a sus padres los cuales son agricultores. Las tierras que ellos trabajan son propias gracias a las buenas temporadas de café que han podido aprovechar para poderlas comprar las cuales están ubicadas a 2 kilómetros de su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan a pie diariamente.

Hoy en día ella solicita ayuda para la fertilizar sus cultivos ya que esto ayudara a fortalecer la planta en su totalidad y cultivar un buen grano el cual pueda ser atractivo para sus clientes.

Sus planes son los de poder comprar más tierra y poder cultivar café, maíz y frijol en masa generando ingresos para su familia y poder cubrir las necesidades y los gastos estudiantiles de sus 2 hijos menores ya que su sueño es verlos convertidos en profesionales.
texts.en:
Basilia is 46 years old, married and the mother of five children.  Three of her children are married and live in their own homes but her two youngest are still in school, in different grades.  Basilia, her husband and her two youngest children live together under the same roof.  Basilia herself didn't receive an education and learned to farm at a very young age (growing coffee, corn and beans).  She has been farming independently for more than 26 years, thanks to her parents.  Basilia owns the land that she works.  Thanks to the good coffee seasons that she has has, she has been able to buy her own land. It is located 2 kilometers from her home and she travels there every day on foot.

Basilia is asking for help so that she can fertilize her crops.  This will help strengthen her plants and enable her to grow good beans which are attractive to her customers.

Basilia's plans are to buy more land where she will grow coffee, corn and beans in larger quantities.  This will make income for her family and she will be able to cover her youngest children's needs and educational expenses.  Her dream is to see them become professionals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her coffee crops

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
This is Eva. She previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase merchandise and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education and their personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy more merchandise and products to increase her product inventory. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her children’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Eva hopes that her business will continue to grow and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise needed in her business, like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics

loans.name: Whatsapp Girls Group

texts.en:
Whatsapp girls is a group of four Filipino women working as housekeepers for Lebanese families. They met in Lebanon and have been friends ever since. They took the decision to initiate the group and contact Al Majmoua because they are each in dire need of a microloan. Jennylind is the group leader and featured member of the group, standing second to the right of the picture. She is a 31-year-old divorced woman and has a child who lives in the Philippines with her retired parents. Her ex-husband does not participate to the financial resources of the family, which makes her the single provider of the family. However, she barely earns enough to provide for her own expenses, which is why she truly needs the Al Majmoua loan, especially because she has to pay the schooling tuition fees of her child. 

Jocelyn is a 40-year-old married mother of three children, standing second to the left of the picture. Her husband is unemployed, which also makes her the only provider of the family, with barely enough money to cover her own expenses. She needs the Al Majmoua loan in order to be able to send her three children back to school.

Myra is a 25-year-old single young lady, standing on the far left of the picture. She wishes to acquire the Al Majmoua loan in order to help her retired parents back in the Philippines.

Jennifer is a 31-year-old single woman, standing on the far right of the picture. Just like Myra, she wishes to help her retired parents back in the Philippines.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fees of her child.

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is 49 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Jovita runs a buying-and-selling recycled materials business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional recycled materials like cans, plastics, empty bottles, etc., to sell.

Jovita has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Jovita would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional scrap materials like cans, plastics, empty bottles, etc., to sell

loans.name: San Cristobal - 26 Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento SAN CRISTOBAL – 26 está  compuesto por nueve integrantes seis mujeres y tres varones, la presidenta del  banco es la Sra.  Florentina tiene 48 años, se dedica a la elaboración de masitas y repostería, el dinero del crédito lo utilizar en la compra de harina y manteca para la elaboración de sus masitas, ella entrega a distintos kioscos sus productos, el deseo de ella es poder abrir con el tiempo una pastelería para poder ofrecer sus productos a sus clientes, ya que muchos que le conocen  compran sus productos por que son deliciosos, la Sra. Florentines una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada a ella ya sus compañeras del grupo ya que en muchos casos son personas que sacan adelante solas a sus familias
texts.en:
The communal bank San Cristobal-26 is made up of 9 members: 6 women and 3 men. The president of the bank is Florentina. She is 48 years old and makes small cakes and pastries. She will use the money from the loan to buy flour and butter to make her pastries. She sells her products at different stands. Her dream is to be able to eventually open a bakery so that she can offer her products to her customers, since many who know her buy her products because they are delicious.

Florentina is a very hardworking person. She is happy for the opportunity given to her and the members of the group, since many of them are the sole breadwinners of their families.

loans.use: to buy flour and butter to make pastries.

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es: Lilian de 33 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su dos hijos se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable es una mujer dedicada a su labor,  quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc.  Lilian está segura que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en: Lilian, 33 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and two children. She is a farmer. Specifically, she grows corn and sorghum. She has been doing this work for many years, and she has very valuable experience that allows her to obtain the best harvests. The land she cultivates is located in an agricultural area. She sells in all the neighboring areas and already has many loyal customers. These people always prefer her products because they are of high quality, the prices are really accessible, and the service is also unequalled. She is a woman who is dedicated to her work. She wants to take advantage of her booming business and increase production and thus have more income. She needs to invest in supplies, but she needs capital, so she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy corn and sorghum seed, manure, insecticide, tools, etc. Lilian is sure that she will be able to pay her debt back on schedule. At the same time, she is confident that she will be able to give her family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn and sorghum seed, manure, insecticide, tools, etc.

loans.name: Jhony Roberto

texts.es:
John tiene 20 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los familiares en la ciudad de Guaranda  Provincia de Bolívar.

Jhony  trabaja en un taller de pintura. Solicita el crédito para pagar la matrícula y gastos de licencia de conducir profesional.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá hacer los trámites para obtener la licencia profesional.

Los trámites pertinentes los realizará en Matriz. El sueño es ser un Chofer profesional. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol y participar en los campeonatos.
texts.en:
.20-year old John is single and has no children. He lives with his relatives in the town of Guaranda, in Bolivar province.

Jhony works as a painter. He is seeking a loan to pay for his vehicle registration and the  cost of a professional driving license. The loan will help him obtain the necessary documentation in Matriz. Jhony's dream is to become a professional driver. In his spare time he enjoys playing football and participating in tournaments.

loans.use: pay for vehicle registration and a professional driving license

loans.name: Osama

texts.en: Osama is 27 years old. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has been operating a ladies' and children's clothing store. He is able to choose appropriate merchandise because he has a good eye. He chose this business because it is very profitable, and he has gained permanent clients over the years. He is friendly, polite, and always gives a discount. He said he collected a small amount to open his enterprise. He would like borrow money to provide for his customer needs, so he has applied for a loan of YER 150,000 from AMB to purchase clothes for his business. He will use this loan to purchase new merchandise and diversify. In the future, he would like to open a clothing store to increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for his business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth, who is married, works hard to support her family. The operator of a mobile electronic load vending business in the Philippines for five years now, she has requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy additional mobile electronic loads to sell. In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional mobile electronic loads to sell

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is a married Iraqi client who is 51 years old and has seven children. He and two of his children provide the family income together.

Abdullah owns a small grocery store where he sells dairy products, canned food, juices, and detergents. He established his business in 2012 and has gained his experience through previously working in a similar field as an employee for couple of years. Abdullah now has an hired employee and has gained good reputation in the neighborhood, thanks to his unique way of customer service.

Abdullah is requesting a loan of 2,400 USD. He will use this loan to renovate his grocery store and install a rolling shutter and an external ceiling. He is aiming to continuously grow his business so that he may take a better care of his family.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store and install a rolling shutter and an external ceiling

loans.name: Beverlyn

texts.en:
Beverlyn is 42 years old and married with six children, five of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Beverlyn has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Beverlyn has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador. Actualmente vive junto a sus padres, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y fríjol con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su casa. El cliente  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía que es donde siembra. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client is a responsible and hardworking man who currently lives with his parents. He works as a farmer growing corn and beans. With the money he earns he manages to pay for household expenses.

He wishes to increase sales so he is seeking a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide etc. These purchases will enable him to improve his land which is shown in the photograph. He needs this loan as he has no other source of funds, and it will allow him to continue putting bread on the table.

loans.use: buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide etc. and improve his land

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es: Ysabel es propietaria de un colmado que tiene 4 años funcionando en un espacio de su casa y que poco a poco ha ido creciendo y le ha ayudado a dar un mejor sustento a su bebe de 2 años. En este momento está solicitando un préstamo de $31,500 pesos con el que desea comprar mercancías para la venta en el colmado como arroz, enlatados, azúcar, embutidos, entre otros, lo que ayudará a aumentar sus ventas, a mantener un inventario adecuado para la demanda de los clientes y resultara en mejores ganancias. El deseo de Ysabel es poder agrandar su negocio y aumentar la diversidad de productos de consumo.
texts.en:
Ysabel is the owner of a grocery store which she's had for four years. She runs it out of her home and has gradually expanded it. It has helped her provide better support for her 2-year old child.

Now Ysabel is seeking a loan of $31,500 pesos to buy merchandise to sell in her store. The purchase of rice, canned goods, sugar, cold cuts etc. will help her increase sales, maintain an adequate inventory for her customers, and result in greater earnings.

Ysabel's goal is to be able to grow her store and increase the variety of products she sells.

loans.use: Buy merchandise such as bags of rice, sugar, cans of oil, canned goods, cold cuts etc. to sell in her store

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos trabaja como consultor y vive en la casa de sus padres en un acabado de fino y piso de machimbre, en la zona de San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz. 
Trabaja  ocho horas al día ya que es el único sustento de él y su hijo.
Juan Carlos requiere el crédito para la compra de una computadora, la cual le ayudará mucho en sus trabajos de consultoría y facilitará su trabajo.
El sueño de Juan Carlos es tener un negocio propio.
Esta es la tercera vez que solicita un crédito a través de IMPRO y la segunda via  Kiva.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos works as a consultant. He lives in his parents house which is nicely finished with a hard wood floor. They live in the San Pedro zone in the city of La Paz. He works 8 hours a day, which provides the only income he has for himself and his son. 

Juan Carlos is requesting a loan to use to buy a computer. It will help him greatly to be able to do his consulting work. Juan Carlos' greatest dream is to have his own business. This is the third loan that he has taken out through IMPRO and the second that has been through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a computer which will be useful to him in his work as a consultant.

loans.name: Yaser

texts.en:
Yaser is an Iraqi youth client who is 22 years old and married. Yaser is the sole provider for his family. 

Yaser owns a garage, where he specializes in fixing damaged car bodies. He has been in this field since 2010, and his reputation and experience have grown rapidly. 

Yaser is requesting a youth loan of 2,400 USD which he will use to install a rolling shutter, an external ceiling and signage for his garage. Yaser is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits in order to provide his family with better living standards.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter, an external ceiling and signage for his garage

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Don Juan de 60 años de edad  es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y su hijo de 16 años de edad, don Juan  es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos como lo son, maíz y fríjol y también la caña de azúcar con lo que elaboran el atado de dulce para comercializarlo lo cual le genera ganancias extra aparte de la de los granos básicos. Juan desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Juan is 60 years old. He is a man who is very responsible with his household obligations; he has always been known for giving his family the best. He currently lives with his wife and their 16-year-old son. 

Juan is very hardworking; he always has carried out his work cheerfully and with enthusiasm. He earns his living by being a farmer. Every year, he plants staple crops like corn and beans. He also grows sugar cane, with which they make "atado de dulce" [a hardened, unprocessed cane-sugar candy] to sell, which generates extra earnings for them on top of what they earn from the staple crops. 

Juan wants to increase his sales, so he visited the offices of INTEGRAL to request a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, soil amendments, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies. He hopes he can count on the help he has asked for since he has no other monetary income; this way he will continue providing for his household without limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, soil amendments, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Jaime Antonio

texts.es: Jaime de 50 años de edad, es muy amable y trabajador, vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 21 años de edad.  El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y sorgo,  sus productos son de muy buena calidad, comercializa sus cosechas en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Jaime solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en: Jaime is 50 years old.  He is very friendly and hardworking and lives with his life companion and 21 year old son.  He owns a plot of land where he works very hard growing corn and sorghum.  His products are of very good quality and he sells his harvests at various markets that are close to his home.  Jaime is requesting a loan from Integral to have enough money to invest in the purchase of farm inputs such as insecticides, fertilizer, organic fertilizer, seeds, and other supplies needed for planting.  He longs to increase his sales and be able to earn higher profits and provide his family with better financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides, fertilizer, organic fertilizer, seeds, and other supplies inputs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase 5 bales of second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба занимается сельским хозяйством. Она молодая замужняя женщина в возрасте 22-х лет, проживающая в городе Турсунзаде. У нее есть муж и один маленький ребёнок. Насиба в данное время с ребенком одна, так как муж уехал на заработки в другую страну, чтобы как-то улучшить условия проживания. Насиба около своего дома имеет участок орошаемой земли. Она занимается там выращиванием овощей уже более трех. Насиба в основном сеит помидоры, картофель, болгарский перец и другие виды овощей. Насиба обратилась за кредитом для приобретения минерального удобрения. Благодаря этому кредиту ее урожай будет высшего качества и ее доход увеличится. После сбора и продажи урожая Насиба планирует приобрести мелко-рогатый скот.
texts.en: Nasiba is engaged in agriculture. She is a young 22-year-old married woman, and lives in the town of Tursun-zoda. She has a husband and a small child. Nasiba is currently alone with her child, because her husband has gone to another country to work, in order to somehow improve their quality of life. Nasiba has a plot of irrigated land near her house. She has been growing vegetables there for more than three years.  Nasiba mostly plants tomatoes, potatoes, bell peppers, and other sorts of vegetables.  Nasiba has asked for a loan to purchase fertilizer. Thanks to this loan, her crop will be of higher quality and her income will increase. After harvesting and selling her crop, Nasiba plans to purchase livestock.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer for her land

loans.name: Llandra Yanisa

texts.es: Llandra es propietaria de un Salón de belleza pequeño y trabaja en su misma casa. Tiene ya 3 años con este negocio y cuenta que inició  en esto porque le permite ganar sustento para sus hijos. Llandra también trabaja en una zona franca donde no gana mucho dinero pero le ayuda a completar para las necesidades básicas de su familia pero quisiera dejar este empleo y dedicarse solamente a su negocio de estilista. Llandra está solicitando un préstamo de $ 10,600 pesos con el que se dispone a comprar productos del cuidado del pelo y algunos accesorios para vender en el Salón. Ella confía en que esto incrementará sus ventas y poco a poco tendrá más clientes y no necesitará tener otro empleo por lo que también tendrá más tiempo para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Llandra is the owner of a small beauty salon that she runs out of her home. She opened this business three years ago in order to provide for her children. Llandra also works in a free trade zone, where she doesn't earn a lot of money, but enough to help her provide for her family. She would like to one day quit this job and devote herself fully to working in her salon. 

Llandra is requesting a loan of $10,600 pesos to buy hair products and some other accessories to sell in her salon. She is confident that this will increase her sales and, little by little, attract more customers so that eventually she will not need to work at her other job at the same time. Then she will have more time for her children.

loans.use: to buy accessories and hair products to sell in her salon.

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer joven de 26 años de edad en unión libre con su pareja y madre de un pequeño de 9 meses de nacido. Ella tiene un grado de educación de primaria completa el cual curso con mucho esfuerzo gracias al apoyo de sus padres los cuales le enseñaron parte del trabajo de la tierra y otra parte por su pareja en lo que es la siembra de maíz y frijol. Ella y su pareja son los únicos que se involucran en el trabajo por lo cual el esfuerzo y trabajo es compartido y mutuo. Las tierras son propias compradas con las ganancias de su trabajo y restringiéndose de muchas cosas para salir adelante mismas que están ubicadas a 2 kilómetros de distancia d su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan a pie diariamente.

Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de semilla certificada de maíz y frijol para cultivar ya que tienen su tierra preparada y lista para sembrar. 

Sus sueños son los de poder ampliar sus tierras para cultivar una mejor y más variedad de granos, dejarle un patrimonio a su hijo fortalecido y que él pueda defenderse en la vida y enfrentar la situación económica de manera favorable como también las de poder sacar a su hijo adelante en sus estudios y demás que él se proponga.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 26 year old woman. She is in a civil union with her partner and is the mother of one nine month old baby. She has completed primary level education, due to much effort on her part and a lot of support from her parents. She learned how to farm partly from her parents and partly from her partner who farms corn and beans. She and her partner are the only ones who do the work involved in farming their crop. They share the work load mutually. They own the land, which they bought with the profits from their work by sacrificing many other things in order to get ahead. The land is located 2 kilometers from their home and they walk their on a daily basis.      

Currently she is requesting a loan to be able to buy certified corn and bean seeds to plant a new crop, as their land is already prepared and ready to plant.

Her dreams are to be able to buy more land so that she can grow better and a larger variety of grains, leave a well established legacy for her son, so that he can defend himself in life and face the economic situation in a good way and also to help her son get ahead in his studies and anything else he wants to accomplish.

loans.use: to buy certified corn and bean seeds to plant.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar es propietario de un pequeño colmado que quiere ir agrandando poco a poco. Está solicitando un prestamos de $10,600 para comprar algunas mercancías (aceite, salsa de tomate, 3 sacos de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, refrescos) para vender en su negocio. Estas mercancías son las de mayor consumo por los clientes y con esta inversión podrá satisfacer su demanda. En un futuro también le gustaría empezar a construir para tener más comodidad en el negocio y brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Edgar is the owner of a small grocery store that he wants to expand little by little. He is requesting a loan of $10,600 (DOP) to buy some merchandise (oil, tomato sauce, three sacks of rice, one sack of sugar, drinks) to sell in his business. These items are the most popular for his customers and with this investment, he will be able to satisfy demand. 

In the future, he also would like to begin construction to create more space for the business and give his customers better service.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his small grocery store, such as tomato sauce, drinks, bags of rice and sugar, and other items.

loans.name: Muazam

texts.ru: Муазам жительница Шахринавского района, расположенный в 30 км западнее города Душанбе. Она 60-летняя вдова и мать четверых детей. У нее трое сыновей и одна дочь. Двое ее сыновей уехали на заработки в заграницу, а третий сын работает в алюминиевом заводе ТАЛКО. Её дочь замужем и живет отдельно. Муазам трудолюбивая, усердная женщина. Она несмотря на свой пожилой возраст занимается земледелием. Она 8 лет в этой сфере деятельности. Муазам выращивает огородные культуры, в частности помидоры, огурцы, болгарский перец, а также выращивает рис. Она запрашивает кредит для закупа минерального удобрения и саженцев, а также за оплату тракториста и рабочих. Ее план на будущее это - приобретение земли и расширение деятельности.
texts.en: Muazam resides in the Shahrinav region, which is located 30 km west of Dushanbe. She is a 60-year-old widow, and the mother of four children. She has three sons and one daughter.  Two of her sons have gone abroad to work, and the third son works in the TALKO aluminum plant. Her daughter is married and lives separately.  Muazam is a hardworking, industrious woman.  Despite her advanced age, she is still engaged in agriculture. She has been in this business for 8 years.  Muazam grows vegetables, such as tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers and rice. She has asked for a loan to purchase fertilizer and seedlings, and also to pay the tractor driver and workers. Her plan for the future is to purchase land and grow her business.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and seedlings, and pay the tractor driver and workers

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en:
This is Soledad. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy more newspapers and some grocery items for her stall. She has this business for twenty years now. She is a widow and she works hard to provide for her family's everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another loan, this time for 20,000 PHP, to buy different products like newspapers, cigarettes, beverages and other items. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to cover their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Soledad hopes to have their own house and dreams that her business will continue to grow. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies there.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for different products like newspapers, cigarettes, beverages and other items.

loans.name: Martin

texts.en: Martin had a wonderful season with the previous loan. His customer base grew and now he is targeting buying his own cattle and slaughtering them for resale. He now seeks a loan of 83,450 Kenya shillings to buy cattle. He wants to stop using middlemen and cut down on expenses. He has an ambition of opening more butcheries. The challenge he faces is unstable market prices.

loans.use: To buy beef cattle.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
Zahra is a 24-year-old married woman, mother of two children. She has been working selling beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, underwear, sleeping clothes and accessories for five years. She works in the same business as her husband does, in order to increase their family's income and develop their living. She opened her own shop in 2009.

Zahra has a lot of faithful customers who support her and encourage her to develop her business and diversify her products.

Zahra is applying for a YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase her cosmetics and accessories capital with a new summer collection.

This will increase her selling process and of course her income. She is working hard to develop and expand her business in such a way that she can help her husband and children more in covering their necessary education fees and living expenses.

loans.use: To increase her cosmetics and accessories capital with a new summer collection

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is 38 years old and married with twp children, one of whom is  in school, Ailyn works very hard to provide for them.

Ailyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell like eggs, noodles, coffee, shampoo, etc. She has been in this business for three years.

In the future Ailyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like eggs, noodles, coffee, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Yorleni

texts.es: Yorleni  tiene  34  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y un  hijo actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar  abonos, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. Ella piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño  y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Yorleni is 34 years old, she is married and lives with her husband and one son. She plans on buying fertilizers, fumigation as well as paying for labor with the loan she is requesting. She plans on giving maintenance to her crops, so that they do not suffer any damage, and in this way her coffee crops will allow her to generate more income to contribute towards her family. 

She does not have the working capital necessary to invest in these supplies, as she is low income and she does not have a way to acquire money for this. This is why she has requested a loan. This will be the first loan she has received through FUDECOSUR. She has not taken out loans in the past from state banks, but decided to with FUDECOSUR because they offered a loan with better terms and an interest rate that is much lower.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Antie Beatrice

texts.en:
Although she has received no formal education, Antie Beatrice is an entrepreneur. She specializes in being a seamstress in Ankaful Prison (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 10 years. 

Antie Beatrice is married and has no children. Her husband works as a taxi driver. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses.  

Antie Beatrice wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to attract more customers. In the long term, Antie Beatrice plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demand.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to attract more customers.

loans.name: Eduviges

texts.es: Eduviges  tiene  50  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y tres hijos actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar  insumos como abonos, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. Ella piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño, y no se pierda la producción, y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ni dichos contratos, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Eduviges is 50 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and three children.  She intends to use the loan to purchase supplies such as organic fertilizer and fumigants and in turn, to help pay for labor.  She plans to maintain the plantations so that they don’t suffer any damage and she doesn’t lose production and thus, with this coffee-growing plan, be able to generate more profits to support her family.  She doesn’t have the necessary capital for such a purpose, or for such contracts, as she has limited resources and doesn’t have any means to acquire the money needed for this.  So, she is requesting a loan, the first she has received from Fudescor.  She hasn’t had any other loans through state banks, but Fudescor has offered her the loan with an easier payment process and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies.

loans.name: Nabi

texts.ru:
Наби добрый и честный мужчина в возрасте 46 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих прекрасных детей. У них очень дружная семья. Наби занимается выращиванием скота. Жена тоже ему помогает. Наби каждый месяц покупает скот и откормив их продает по выгодной цене. Также у него есть торговая точка где он продает мясо своих скотов. У него очень много клиентов. На фотографии в белой рубашке  один из постоянных клиентов Наби.  Он очень часто покупает у Наби мясо.  Наби очень доволен своим бизнесом так как имеет очень хорошую прибыль.
Наби планирует купить еще скот и поэтому обратился в Арванд за кредитом, он хочет увеличить поголовье скота и развивать свой бизнес. Очень надеется на финансовую поддержку со стороны Арванд и заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Nabi is a kind and honest 46-year-old man. He is married and has two wonderful children. He has a very tight-knit family. Nabi raises cattle for a living. His wife helps him as well. Every month, Nabi purchases cattle, fattens them, and then sells them for a profit. He also has a small shop where he sells the meat from his cattle. He has many customers. In the photograph, the man in the white shirt is one of Nabi's customers.  He frequently buys meat from Nabi. Nabi is very pleased with his business, as it provides him with a good income.  Nabi plans to buy more cattle, and has asked Avrand for a loan.  He hopes to increase the size of his herd and grow his business.  He hopes very much to receive financial assistance from Avrand and thanks you in advance for your generosity.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Natalia Isabel

texts.es:
Natalia de 29 años de edad, es propietaria de un Café internet ubicado en un espacio de su casa en el cual labora diariamente. Gracias a su actividad genera un empleo directo. 
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un computador y artículos papelería con el propósito de mejorar la calidad en el servicio y ampliar su portafolio de productos. Sueña con brindarle a su hija de nueve años de edad, la oportunidad recibir una buena educación. Espera que con dicha inversión mejore su condición económica y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Natalia is a 29-year-old who is the owner of an Internet Café located in part of her home. She works there every day. Her business provides a direct job for her.

She is seeking a loan that she will invest in the purchase of a computer and stationery supplies with the purpose of improving the quality of service and increasing her product inventory. She dreams of providing her 9-year-old daughter with the opportunity to receive a good education. She hopes that with this loan her economic position and the quality of life of her family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and stationery supplies

loans.name: Abdujalil

texts.ru: Абдучалил жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 64 лет. Он женат и имеет всего одного ребёнка. Всю свою жизнь он со своей женой посвятили своему сыну. Сейчас их сын живёт со своей семьёй неподалёку от них. Абдучалил также очень рад растить своих внуков, их у него трое. Так как они живут в маленьком посёлке, они занимаются дехканством, чтобы иметь стабильный доход на проживание. Абдучалил выращивает зерновые культуры, для этого у него имеется небольшая площадь земли для выращивания. Сын помогает ему в данном деле. Также они имеют небольшое количество скота, за которым ухаживают для дальнейшей продажи. Жена также помогает Абдучалилу в дехканстве и выращивании скота. От выращивания и продажи скота они имеют дополнительный доход. Но сейчас Абдучалил хочет увеличить объём урожая зерновых культур и получить приемлемый доход от этого. Чтобы закупить большее количество семян зерновых культур для посева, ему необходимы денежные средства. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит для закупа необходимых семян зерновых культур, он надеется на поддержку и заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Abdujalil is a cheerful 64-year-old man. He is married and has only one child. He and his wife have dedicated their lives to their son. Now, their son lives with his own family not far from them. Abdujalil is also very happy to raise his three grandchildren. Because they live in a small village, they are engaged in farming in order to have a stable income to live on. Abdujalil has a small plot of land on which he grows grain.  His son helps him with the business. They also have a small quantity of cattle, which they raise in order to sell later on. His wife helps Abdujalil with farming and raising livestock. Raising and selling cattle supplements their income. Now, Abdujalil wants to increase the yield of his grain harvest and receive additional income. He needs financial means in order to purchase a larger quantity of seeds to plant. Because of this, he has turned to Arvand and hopes to receive a loan to purchase seeds necessary to plant grain.  He hopes to receive your support and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Abdukarim

texts.ru: Абдукариму 34 года. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Абдукарим с женой и детьми проживает в районе Дж.Руми. У него среднее образование. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Абдукарим занимается земледелием. Чтобы улучшить финансовое положение семьи, Абдукарим намерен заняться животноводческим бизнесом. Он планирует закупать мелкорогатый скот, откармливать в течение месяца и затем продавать на рынке с наценкой. Многие жители района занимаются этим бизнесом, так как он приносит хорошую прибыль. У Абдукарима имеются все условия для разведения скота. Он запрашивает кредит для закупа 6-голов мелкорогатого скота и его корма.
texts.en: Abdukarim is 34 years old.  He is married and has two children.  Abdukarim, his wife and his children live in the J Rumy region.  He has a middle school education. His wife is a housewife. Abdukarim is engaged in agriculture. In order to improve the financial situation of his family, Abdukarim plans to take up the livestock business.  He plans to purchase goats and sheep, fatten them over the course of a month, and then sell them at the market for profit. Many other residents in his area also engage in this business, as it brings a good income. Abdukarim has established all the conditions necessary to raise livestock.  He has asked for a loan to purchase 6 heads of livestock and their feed.

loans.use: To purchase 6 heads of livestock and their feed

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Ignacia works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice.  Ignacia is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, noodles, spices, cream, etc. for her general store business.

Ignacia has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, noodles, spices, cream, etc.

loans.name: Vitalino

texts.es: Vitalino de 38 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y sus siete hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida, siempre está al pendiente de su familia ya que para él es su principal fuente de inspiración y desea poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Vitalino is 38 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and six children.  He grows corn and sorghum.  He does this year after year, and it is the only means of making a living that he knows.  He is always looking out for his family, since they are his principal source of inspiration, and he wants to provide them with a better life.

He has decided to seek a loan in order to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, fungicide, seeds and other items.  He hopes to obtain good results, since he does not have any other source of income.  He has faith in God that he will manage to obtain an abundant harvest, which will allow him to continue putting bread on his family's table every day.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, fungicide, seeds and other items.

loans.name: Elisa Ysabel

texts.es: Elisa tiene un negocio en un punto transitado de la zona donde vive donde vende frutas y también vende café, refrescos y mabí (que es una bebida a base de corteza de árbol consumida ampliamente en el Caribe). Hace 13 años vio la oportunidad de iniciar este negocio por la necesidad de los transeúntes de encontrar algo refrescante para comer o beber y en ese momento no había nadie vendiendo allí. Hoy en día ha ido aumentando la variedad que ofrece a sus clientes. Elisa está solicitando un préstamo de $15,900 pesos para comprar mercancías como manzanas, refrescos, café, agua y algunos materiales con los que hace mabí. Elisa quiere seguir aumentando su negocio y este préstamo le ayudara a incrementar sus ganancias y poco a poco ampliar la variedad de productos que vende.
texts.en:
Elisa has a business in a busy area where she sells fruit. She also sells coffee, soft drinks, and “mabí” (a beverage made from tree bark that is widely consumed in the Caribbean). Thirteen years ago, Elisa saw the opportunity to start this business because there was no one available to sell food or beverages to people who were passing by. Today she has increased the variety that she offers to her customers.

Elisa is requesting a loan of 15,900 DOP so that she can buy merchandise such as apples, soft drinks, coffee, water, and a few supplies for making “mabí”. She wants to continue growing her business, so this loan will help to increase her earnings and gradually expand the variety of products that she sells.

loans.use: to buy apples, soft drinks, coffee, water, and supplies for making “mabí” (a popular Caribbean beverage).

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia es comerciante de ají y condimentos;  vive en alquiler en un acabado de cemento y piso de cemento, en la zona de Alto Tejar de la ciudad de La Paz. Trabaja  más de ocho horas al día ya que es el único sustento que tiene.
Natalia requiere el crédito para el aumento de su mercadería, comprara ají entero, ají molido, tunta (es papa deshidratada y secada al sol hasta que toma un color plomo y adquiere un sabor diferente a la papa normal)  y otros.
El sueño de Natalia es tener casa propia.
Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO y de Kiva.
texts.en: Natalia is a merchant who sells chili and condiments.  She lives in a rented home with a cement finish and concrete floor in the Alto Tejar region of La Paz.  She works over eight hours a day as it is her only livelihood.  Natalia is requesting the loan to expand her merchandise.  She will purchase whole chilies, ground chili, “tunta” [potatoes that are dehydrated and dried in the sun until they turn gray and acquire an unusual flavor], and other products.  Her dream is to own her own home.  This is the first loan she is requesting from Impro and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase chilies, "tunta", and other wholesale products for later sale to customers.

loans.name: Angel Ruben

texts.es: Ángel de 38 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maíz, fríjol, desde hace 15 años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados de granos básicos, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar vive con su esposa y sus cinco hijos.  Ángel solicita un crédito para poder mejorar el terreno donde piensa hacer su siembra y comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y así el pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en:
Ángel is 38 years old and has been growing corn and beans for the last 15 years. This has given him the experience necessary to successfully grow his crops.  He sells his produce in markets.  With the earnings that he obtains from his sales, he manages to meet his household expenses.  He lives with his wife and five children.  

He is seeking a loan so that he can make improvements to the land where he plants his crops, and to buy the necessary supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides, compost and other items.  This will allow him to obtain good harvests, which will in turn lead to greater earnings so that he can provide his family with greater financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, compost and other items.

loans.name: Dinnier

texts.es: Dinnier tiene la edad de 38 años, es casado y tiene dos hijos. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de ganado de cría y cuando estén grandes venderlos y obtener una ganancia. El negocio del ganado le ayudará a el y a su familia a salir adelante. Es la primera vez que Dinnier se financia con FUDECOSUR, el manifiesta que el comité de crédito le ha ayudado mucho y le ha brindaron muchas facilidades. El espera que con este proyecto crezca y logre sus objetivos y así pueda en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Dinnier is a 38-year-old married man with two children.  He is seeking a loan so that he can buy cattle to raise.  When the animals have grown larger he will sell them for a profit.

The livestock business will help him and his family to have a better life.  This is the first time that Dinnier is seeking a loan through FUDECOSUR.  He reports that the institution has been very helpful and has made things very easy for him.  He hopes that through this process he will grow and achieve his objectives, and thus be able to provide his family with a better quality of life and greater financial stability.

He has not taken other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has brought him this loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente se dedica a la agricultura, su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa de su patrón con su dos hijos pues trabaja como ayudante en una clínica que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa y darle a sus hijos lo que necesita sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
The client is a farmer, and his main crops are corn and beans. He sells his crops at the companies near his home that buy and sell staple grains. With the earnings he gets from his sales he helps with his family's expenses. 

He lives in his employer's home with his two children, as he works as a helper at a clinic near his home. He is requesting a loan so that he can buy agricultural supplies that help him grow his crops, such as: manures, seeds and fertilizers. This way can have better earnings, continue helping with the expenses of his household, and meet all of his children's needs.

loans.use: To buy manure, seeds, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Jonathan Joselito

texts.es:
Jonathan tiene 30 años de edad es soltero tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos y unos familiares en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Jonathan es taxista. Solicita el crédito para realizar un arreglo de la suspensión del vehículo. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá arreglar el vehículo y seguir dando un buen servicio a la comunidad. El arreglo lo realizará en Guaranda en un taller mecánico. 

El sueño es tener una casa propia. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar futbol.
texts.en:
Jonathan is 30 years old, single, and has two children. He lives with his children and a few of his relatives in Guaranda, which is in Bolívar Province.

Jonathan is a taxi driver and is requesting a loan to repair the suspension on his vehicle. With the help of this loan, he will be able to repair his vehicle so that he can continue providing good service to the community. The repairs will be completed in Guaranda at a mechanic's shop.

Jonathan’s dream is to have a house of his own. In his free time, he enjoys practicing soccer.

loans.use: to repair the suspension on his vehicle.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
Oswaldo tiene 61 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y los hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Oswaldo  es albañil. Solicita el crédito para comprar varillas, mezcladora, espátula.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para poder trabajar. Las compras las realizará en Guaranda. El sueño es ver a los hijos profesionales. 

En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a pasar en la casa.
texts.en: Oswaldo is 61 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his family in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.  Oswaldo is a bricklayer and is requesting the loan to purchase rods, mixer, and spatulas.  With the help of this loan, he will buy what he needs to be able to work.  He will make his purchases in Guaranda.  His dream is to see his children become professionals.  In his free time, he enjoys spending time at home.

loans.use: to purchase rods, mixer, and spatulas.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es: Carlos de 42 años de edad  se dedica a cultivar la tierra, con mucha dedicación cultiva maíz, maicillo y jocotes, lo cual le permite llevar el  pan de cada día a su hogar.  Se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y responsable. Habita junto a su  esposa y sus dos hijos,  trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. carlos  solicita un crédito ya que necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.  para la siembra. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará  tener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá acceder a una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 42 and farms the land. With a great deal of dedication, he grows corn, sorghum and jocotes (a tropical fruit native to this area), and this allows him to support his household. He is noted for being a hard-working, honest and responsible man. He lives with his wife and their two children and works very hard to help his family succeed in life. 

Carlos is requesting a loan, as he needs to purchase the agricultural supplies he needs, such as seeds, manures and insecticides. He trusts in God and in his work, that in this way he will achieve an abundant harvest, which will allow him to access a better quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manures, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Juan De Jesus

texts.es: Juan decidió iniciar su negocio hace 3 años buscando la forma de tener ingresos que le ayudaran a cuidar de su familia; así inició su colmado que poco a poco ha ido creciendo con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo. Ahora está solicitando un préstamo de $10,600 pesos para comprar mercancías de venta como enlatados, salami, azúcar, habichuelas, arroz, huevos, etc. De esta manera el aumenta su inventario, responde a las demandas de sus clientes e incrementa sus ingresos. Su deseo para el futuro es poder ampliar su negocio y posteriormente habilitar un local comercial, porque lo que quiere es garantizar la educación universitaria de 4 sus hijos (10, 7, 5 y 1 año de edad)
texts.en:
Juan decided to start his business three years ago.  He was looking for a way to have income to help take care of his family.  That is how he started his grocer’s shop.  With much effort and work, it has been growing little by little.

He is now requesting a loan for 10,600 pesos to buy merchandise to sell.  He will buy things like canned goods, salami, sugar, beans, rice, and eggs, etc.  This way he will increase his inventory, respond to his customers’ demand, and increase his income.

His wish for the future is to be able to expand his business and to later procure a commercial place.  He wants to do this because he wants to guarantee his four children (ages 10, 7, 5, and 1) a university education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like canned goods, salami, sugar, beans, rice, and eggs, etc. to sell at his store.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 29 years old and married with two children.

Jennifer works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, dried fish, soap, spices, etc.

Jennifer has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from motorcycle transport.

Jennifer aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, dried fish, soap, spices, etc.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора 26-летняя замужняя женщина. Она с мужем и тремя детьми проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Муж Нигоры предоставляет услуги маршрутного такси. Сама Нигора занимается сельским хозяйством. В 2005 году она начала деятельность в области растениеводства и до сегодняшнего дня продолжает свою работу. Нигора получает доход от деятельности, который помогает ей покрывать семейные расходы. Она в основном выращивает овощи, такие как помидоры, огурцы и т.д. Нигора просит кредит для закупа минерального удобрения и обработки земли. Ее цель получить хороший и качественный урожай и с полученного дохода от его продажи устроить торжество по случаю обрезания своих сыновей.
texts.en: Nigora is 26 years old, married and has three children.  She lives with her family in Tursun-zoda, Tajikistan.  Her husband works as a taxi driver.  She herself works with agriculture.  In 2005, she started her business and to this day it continues.  Nigora's income from this endeavor helps her cover her family's expenses.  She mostly grows vegetables like tomatoes, cucumbers and the like.  She is asking for a loan for fertilizer and tillage.  Her goal is to have a good, high quality harvest, the funds from which will pay for the celebrations of her sons' circumcisions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and tillage

loans.name: Toshpulot

texts.ru: Тошпулот 36-летний деятельный человек. Он женат и является отцом троих дочерей и одного сына. Тошпулот собирается заняться торговлей продуктами питания в своем районе в Шахритузе. Он считает, что продуктовый бизнес является достаточно прибыльным делом и у него имеется опыт в данной сфере. Тошпулот уже приобрел помещение для магазина. Он расположен на центральном рынке района и это удачное место для начало бизнеса. Кроме этого у Тошпулота имеется стартовый капитал в размере 3500 TJS. Остальную недостающую сумму он запрашивает в кредит. На сумму своего сбережения и кредита он собирается приобрести ассортимент продуктов питания хорошего качества. Тошпулот верит в успешное начало своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Toshpulot is an active man, 36 years old.  He is married and has three daughters and one son.  Toshpulot plans to begin selling food goods in his region of  Shahrituz.  He feels that grocery is a profitable business and he has experience in the industry.  Toshpulot has already secured a space for his store.  It is located at the central market of the region, a fortuitous location to start a business.  Besides this, Toshpulot has 3,500 TJS of start-up capital.  This is not enough and to bridge the gap, he's asking for a loan.  He will us the funds to buy an assortment of high quality products.  He believes in his new business and thinks it will be successful.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of food goods

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor  de 40 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz y sorgo. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 10 años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás.  Vive con su esposa en casa propia, Víctor ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor is 40 years old and farms, growing corn and sorghum. He has done this work for 10 years of his life, and this is how he earns his daily living. He is a hard-working, responsible man, well known in the area for his big heart and friendliness toward others. He lives with his wife in their own home.

Victor has decided to request this new loan from Integral, so that he can purchase seeds, manure, insecticides, etc. What he most wishes is for his harvest to be abundant and better than the previous ones, as this is the way he supports his family. He trusts in God that with his help, and his own dedication to his work, he will achieve his dream of improving his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Doris Maria

texts.es:
Doris tiene  28 años de edad es soltera  tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar. 

Doris se dedica a la atención al cliente en una compañía telefónica. Solicita el crédito para comprar cortinas, alfombras, vitrinas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para el hogar. 

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. 

El sueño es tener una vivienda propia. En el tiempo libre le gusta leer libros de informática y  jugar butbool.
texts.en:
Doris is 28 years old. She is single and has three children. She lives with the children in Guaranda, in Bolívar province. 

Doris earns her living in customer service at a telephone company. She is requesting the loan to purchase curtains, carpets, and china cabinets. With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy what she needs for her home. She will make her purchases in Guaranda. 

Doris's dream is to own a house. In her free time, she likes to read information technology books and play soccer.

loans.use: to purchase curtains, carpets, and china cabinets.

loans.name: Saidhuja

texts.ru: Саидхуча честный молодой человек. Ему 22 года. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Саидхуча данное время является студентом 4 курса Таджикского Государственного Университета. Он учится по специальности юриста. Саидхуча поступил в университет в 2009 году и в течение этих лет, он учится хорошо и отлично. Саидхуча еще со школьной скамьи мечтал стать адвокатом и упорно учился. Он самый младший ребенок в семье. Его старшие братья тоже имеют высшее образование. Его семья интеллигентная. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег для этого. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saidhuja is an honest young man.  He is 22 years old, unmarried, and lives with his parents.  At the moment, he is a fourth year student and Tajikistan State University.  He is studying to become an attorney.  Saidhuja entered the university in 2009, and since then, he has received very high marks.  He has wanted to become a lawyer since he was a school boy, and studied hard to make it happen.  He is the youngest child in his family.  His older brothers also have degrees.  His family is intelligent.  He needs to pay his tuition, but does not have the money to do so.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition

loans.name: Urol

texts.ru: Урол житель района Дж.Руми. Он 35 летний женатый мужчина и у него четверо детей. Его жена портниха. Она вышивает женские национальные платья у себя дома. Дети несовершеннолетние. Урол честный и порядочный человек. У него среднее образование. Он работает на почте своего района. Урол сейчас хочет начать бизнес овцеводства. Он имеет помещение для содержания овец, а также бизнес план разведения овец. Урол запрашивает кредит для закупа 6-голов овец и их корма, чтобы приступить к делу. Он надеется, что этот бизнес увеличит доход его семьи и улучшит условия проживания семьи. В будущем на полученный доход от бизнеса Урол хочет провести торжество по случаю обрезания сына.
texts.en: Urol is a resident of J.Rumy, Tajikistan.  He is 35 years old and has 4 children.  His wife is a dressmaker.  She makes the national women's dress out of their home.  Their children are not yet grown.  Urol is an honest and decent man.  He finished high school.  He works with the postal service of his region.  Now, he wants to start his own business raising sheep.  He has a building for the animals and also a business plan.  He is asking for a loan to buy 6 sheep as well as food for him.  This will help him start his business.  He hopes that this endeavor will increase's his family income and, in turn, their quality of life.  In the future, he wants to be able to use his business's income to celebrate his son's circumcision.

loans.use: to buy six sheep and their fodder

loans.name: Jansel Michell

texts.es: Jansel se ha preparado y dedicado a la reparación de motocicletas por más de 5 años y hace 2 años inició su propio negocio en esa área. Tiene un taller de mecánica y también vende repuestos, él está solicitando un préstamo de $51,750 para poner el techo al taller y acondicionarlo. Esto le dará más comodidad para el trabajar y para los clientes que el recibe, también tendrá más seguridad y podrá abarcar a más clientes. Jansel desea instruir a sus 3 hijos por el buen camino, enseñándoles con su ejemplo a trabajar honradamente.
texts.en: Jansel trained himself and has been engaged in motorcycle repair for over five years.  Two years ago, he began his own business in this field.  He has a mechanic shop and also sells parts.  He is requesting a loan of $1,275 to install a roof on the shop and fit it out.  This will give him more comfort while working and the customers will be more comfortable as well.  It will also be safer and he will be able to take on more customers.  Jansel wants to educate his three children to follow the right path and is teaching them, by his example, to work honestly

loans.use: to install a roof on his mechanic workshop and improve the business.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Alma works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Alma is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to re-stock her store with food and household goods like soap, canned goods, soft drinks, coffee, sugar, etc. to sell.

Alma has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to re-stock her store with food and household goods like soap, canned goods, soft drinks, coffee, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba is a widow who has six children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Aba is a successful businesswoman. She prepares and sells banku for a living (a traditional Ghanaian dish made using fermented corn/cassava dough that is mixed proportionally and cooked in hot water into a smooth whitish paste). She normally sells her banku in Ankaful Prison (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about three years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Aba uses her income to provide for the entire family. Aba will use the loan to purchase more maize and cassava, in order to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Aba plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells to adapt to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase maize and cassava for making banku

loans.name: Rene
