texts.es: Rene  de sesenta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos, es un hombre trabajador y responsable. Desde a hace varios años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside también a la agricultura, siembra maíz. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar concentrado y vitaminas para el ganado que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en:
Rene is 60 years old. He lives with his life partner and their four children. He is a hardworking and responsible man. 

For the past several years, he has earned his living producing and selling dairy products in the area where he lives, as well as farming; he grows corn. He has a very good clientele because he knew how to win his customers' trust. He offers quality and good prices on his products. 

Rene has decided to invest in the care of his cattle since his business depends on them, so he requested a loan to buy concentrated feed and vitamins for his cattle to allow him to grow his business. With this investment, he hopes to obtain favorable results and to continue providing his household with the economic help that they so badly need.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and vitamins for his cattle.

loans.name: Ana Yocasty

texts.es: Ana tiene un salón de belleza en el que ha estado trabajado por 15 años haciendo lo que le gusta y apasiona. Ella quiere mantenerse siempre a la vanguardia con las distintas tendencias de corte y color porque la competencia siempre es grande. Muchas veces hay hasta 4 salones en una misma calle por lo que debe mantenerse al día para garantizar la satisfacción de sus clientes. Ella está solicitando un préstamo de $15,900 pesos para comprar algunos productos del pelo y equipo electico necesarios para el trabajo que realiza. Ana desea poder llevar siempre un estilo moderno en su salón de belleza y en un futuro poder ampliar el espacio para captar una mayor cantidad de clientes.
texts.en:
Ana has a beauty salon where she has been working for 15 years, doing what she likes and is her passion. She wants to always remain in the forefront when it comes to the various trends for cuts and color, because competition is always great. Many times there are up to four salons on the same street, so she has to keep up-to-date to ensure customer satisfaction.

She is requesting a loan of 15,900 pesos, so that she can buy some hair products and electrical equipment that she needs for the work she does. Ana wishes to always maintain a modern style in her beauty salon, and someday be able to expand the space, so that she can acquire a greater number of clients.

loans.use: To buy hair products and equipment.

loans.name: Felipe Santiago

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Felipe quien con su credikiva anterior invirtió en la compra de insumos para la compra de sus comidas rápidas, negocio que desmpeña todos los fines de semana y hasta le alcanzó para comprar repuestos electrónicos para mejorar el servicio en su taller de electrico,   Ahora sus dos negocios mejoraron, teniendo su propio stock en su oferta y también vende otros productos y accesorios. Felipe dice a sus financiadores: “Gracias a ustedes hoy mis dos negocios han crecido”. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva mediante el cual comprará  salsas e inusmos para elaborar sus comidas rápidas y tambien repuestos electrónicos, videojuegos y controles para los videojuegos. Todo esto con el afán de continuar su crecimiento empresarial haciendo así de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Felipe with his previous Kiva loan which he invested in his electronics repair shop; he bought spare parts and also video game accessories.  He now has his own stock to sell and also sells other accessories.  Felipe says to his lenders: “Thanks to you my shop has grown to date.”  

He’s currently applying for a Kiva loan to buy electronic spare parts, video games and video game controls.  All of this is aimed at continued business growth making his Kiva loan a successful investment.

loans.use: comprará  salsas e inusmos para elaborar sus comidas rápidas y tambien repuestos electrónicos, videojuegos y controles para los videojuegos.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La cliente vive en casa de sus padres con su hijo de tres años de edad es madre soltera, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y el maicillo, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, ella esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
The client lives in her parents home with her three-year-old son, and is a single mother. She has been farming for several years, and that has given her the ability and knowledge she needs to maintain her crops. Her main crops are corn and sorghum. She sells her crops to the companies near her home that buy and sell staple grains. With the earnings she gets from her sales, she helps with her family's expenses. 

She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies that help her grow her crop, such as manures, seeds and fertilizers. This way she can have better earnings and continue helping with her household's expenses as much as possible.

loans.use: To buy manures, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Due to difficult circumstances, Ekua did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Ekua prepares and sells kenkey (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough wrapped in banana leaves) in Effutuakwa, a village near Cape Coast. She has been doing this for about seven years. She is married to a farmer, and together they have eight children. Ekua uses all of her income to feed and provide for her family. She will use the loan to purchase additional maize, which will aid her in improving her overall kenkey sales. Ekua wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all of her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase maize, which will improve her kenkey sales

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael tiene la edad de 45 años, está casado y vive con la esposa y un hijo. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de abono y dar asistencia a una plantación de café. El desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rafael is 45 years old, married, and lives with his wife and son. He wants the loan to buy fertilizer and to maintain his coffee plantation. He wishes to maintain his crop properly, so that it will allow him to have larger production and greater income. He hopes to someday provide his family with a better quality of life and greater financial stability. He wants to be able to continue growing as a person and as a coffee producer. 

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He had not had other loans from regular banks before, but FUDECOSUR has provided him the loan with better terms and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Rosa  Noemy

texts.es: Rosa de 32 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajador quien vive junto a su grupo familiar, el cual esta conformado por su esposo e hijos. Ella es propietaria de un moto taxi en el cual hace viajes a diferentes lugares cerca de su municipio, es gracias a este trabajo como ella puede cubrir  algunos gastos de su hogar.  Rosa recibe llamadas telefónicas solicitando sus servicios, con todo el deseo de darles lo mejor a sus hijos solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de repuestos y darle mantenimiento a su moto taxi,  ya que su mayor deseo es que no les falte nada a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 32, is a very hard-working woman.  She lives with her family, which is comprised of her husband and children.  She has a motorcycle taxi in which she makes trips to different places near her municipality.  It is thanks to this work that she is able to cover some of the household expenses.  Rosa receives phone calls requesting her services.  

With a complete desire to give her children the best, she is requesting a loan from Integral.  She will use the loan to buy replacement parts and to perform maintenance on her motorcycle taxi.  Her greatest wish is for her family to have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts and to perform maintenance on her motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Dinora De Jesús

texts.es:
La señora Dinora vive en un barrio situado en la parte sur de la capital Managua. es madre soltera  con un niño en edad escolar. se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora trabajadora propietaria de su negoció  en su casa de habitación. 

Se dedica a la elaboración de lampazo para posteriormente comercializarlo en los mercado de la capital y en pulperías.
 
Doña Dinora solicita a kiva un crédito para la compra de materiales como hierro para la elaboración de su producto y hacer aumentar su capital de trabajo y hacer mejorar  su ganancia y así mejorar su nivel de vida  y seguir preparando en sus estudio a su hijo  ya que su meta  es lograr preparar profesionalmente a sus hijo.
texts.en:
Dinora lives in a neighborhood in the southern part of the capital, Managua.  She is a single mother with a school age child.  She is known for being an enterprising and hard-working woman.  She has a business at her house.

She makes mops to later sell at the markets in the capital and in grocery stores.

Dinora is requesting a Kiva loan to buy materials like iron to make her product, to increase her working capital, and to improve her profits.  This way she will improve her standard of living and continue getting ready for her son’s education.  Her goal is to manage to prepare her son professionally.

loans.use: to buy metal.

loans.name: Andres Alfonso

texts.es: Andrés es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son  maíz y sorgo. Andrés  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Andrés is a man who is very responsible with his home obligations, as he has always been noted for providing the best for his family. Currently, he lives with his wife and his children. He is very hard-working, and has as always done his work with joy and enthusiasm. He is a farmer, and every year grows the main staple grains of the area, which are corn and sorghum. 

Andrés wishes to increases his sales, and that is why he visited the Integral offices to apply for loan that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides and other supplies. He wishes to have the requested assistance, as he doesn't have other income, and this way he will continue supporting his household as much as possible.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manures, fertilizers, pesticides and other supplies.

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
Ester is 56 years old and married with three children.

Ester works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell like shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, bath soap and other groceries in her general store.

Ester has borrowed and repaid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns additional income from mobile electronic load retailing.

Ester aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, bath soap and other groceries in her general store.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Desiree works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Desiree is borrowing 21,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell for her vegetable business.

Desiree has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort is 21 years old and operates a table at the market, selling goods such as plantains, cassava, sweet potatoes, etc., in the Paynesville South area of Liberia. It is a suburb of the capital city of Monrovia and one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County. The area boasts one of the best standards of living in the county, with affordable rents, good roads, access to water and lots of transportation options.    

She is a single with a 2-month-old child. The last grade she finished before getting into business was grade 11. For the past two years, she has been selling sugar, milk, bread, etc., in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her mother. 

She enjoys her business because the business gives her more money. She sells six days a week, from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m, and most of the time she uses a shared taxi to get her goods to her shop. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods for her business. Her plan is to build a house and educate her child.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business.

loans.name: Lasticia

texts.pt:
Professora de profissão, vive maritalmente há 6 anos e tem 2 filhos com 10 e 4 anos de idade. O mais velho dos seus filhos está a estudar.
Com o presente empréstimo para habitação irá comprar cimento, pedra, areia e blocos para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa. Actualmente a Lasticia tem só um quarto e uma sala e deseja construir um quarto para os seus filhos e uma cozinha. Na fotografia pode-se ver a Lasticia e na retaguarda o que será o quarto dos seus filhos.
No futuro deseja terminar a sua obra e voltar a estudar para o seu crescimento profissional.
texts.en:
A teacher by profession, for the past six years Lasticia has lived as a married wife and has two children ages 4 and 10. The older child is studying in school.
With this housing loan, she will buy cement, stone, sand and blocks, to continue the construction of her home. Lasticia's home currently has only one bedroom and one living room and they want to build a bedroom for the children and a kitchen. In the photo, you can see that behind Lasticia is what will be the room for the children.  
In the future, she wants to finish her work and go back to studying for her professional growth.

loans.use: to buy building materials (cement, stone, sand and blocks) to continue the construction of her home.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma lives in Sevkar village in the Tavush region. She has a big family but she lives with her husband and daughter. Her son is in military service and her elder daughter is married and lives with her family. Emma and his husband are engaged in agriculture and farming. They have a very rich and beautiful far. They keep four cows, five pigs, twenty chickens and six turkeys. Their farm brings good income and Emma thinks that she has a chance to enlarge it in the near future.

Emma is not a newcomer and she has a perfect and exemplary credit history. She has taken a loan from Nor Horizon four times and it is already the second one from Kiva that she wants to take. She needs this loan to buy piglets, chickens and a lot of fodder for her farm animals.

loans.use: to buy piglets, chickens and a lot of fodder for her farm animals

loans.name: Ide Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora ide del Carmen vive  en la cuidad de Managua, trabaja en un populoso mercado de la capital desde  hace 20 años se dedica a la venta de ropa interior y ropa de dama y niño.

Doña ide hace su solicitud de préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mercadería para incrementar su inventario ya que su venta se incrementa en el mes de mayo.

Ide manifiesta que  gracias a los crédito obtenidos en ceprodel le han servido para ir creciendo en su negocio  y incrementando sus ganancias y esto le ha permitido pagar los estudios a sus hijos y mejorar su condición de vida. 
.
texts.en:
Ide del Carmen lives in the city of Managua and works in a busy market in the capital. For 20 years, she has been selling underwear, as well as women's and children's clothing.

Ide is applying for a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise to increase her inventory, as her sales have grown in the month of May.

Ide states that the loans obtained from Ceprodel have helped her business grow; increasing her earnings and allowing her to pay for her children's education and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy women's and children's clothing.

loans.name: Pablo Baudelio

texts.es:
El señor pablo vive en la cuidad de managua desde hace 20 años trabaja como guarda de seguridad en una  universidad de la capital.

don pablo esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de zicz y perlines para hacer el cambio de techo de su vivienda ya que con la venida del invierno necesita hacer esa mejoras, ya que el zinc que esta utilizando esta en mal estado.

agradece mucho a los inversionista de kiva ya con los créditos anteriores  ha mejorado su vivienda.
texts.en:
Pablo has been living in the city of Managua for 20 years. He works as a security guard at the University. Pablo is requesting a loan so that he can purchase sheet metal roofing and purlins to replace the roof of his home, as with the coming of winter he needs to make those improvements. His current sheet-metal roofing is in poor condition. 

He is very grateful to the Kiva investors, as with the previous loans he has improved his house.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal roofing and purlins.

loans.name: Elmer Antonio

texts.es: Don Elmer de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, desde hace 15 años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados de granos básicos con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Don Elmer solicita un crédito para comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y así el pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Elmer is 41 and lives in his own home with his life partner and their two children. He has been growing corn and sorghum for 15 years, and this has given him the necessary experience to maintain his crops. His sells his harvests in the staple grains markets, and with the earnings he gets from his sales, he manages to pay for his household expenses. 

Elmer is applying for a loan to buy the supplies he needs, such as fertilizers, herbicides, manures, and other things, so that he can have good harvests, be able to earn more, and provide his family with better financial stability.

loans.use: Buy fertilizers, herbicides, manures, etc.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is a married client from Iraq. He is 39 years old and has 4 children. 

Haydar specializes in fixing truck engines. When he was young, Haydar used to help his uncle in his garage and chose to take this career path as a way of income. Haydar gained good experience in this field. In 2000, he established his own business and now he has 2 hired employees.

Haydar is requesting a loan of 1,500 USD to pay the annual rent of his garage. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits in order to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his garage.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lot of new beehives.

loans.name: Suzette

texts.en:
Suzette is 48 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Suzette has a business selling cashew products in the Philippines. Suzette requested a PHP 28000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of cashews to sell.

Suzette has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Suzette would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of cashews to sell.

loans.name: Asatu

texts.en:
30 year old Asatu operates a shop selling rice, oil, salt, vita, pepper, etc. in the Paynesville South area of Liberia. It is a suburb of the capital city of Monrovia and one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County. The area boasts one of the best standards of living in the county with affordable rents, good roads, access to water, and lots of transportation options.

She is married and has four children between ages 1 and 13. Only three are currently attending school and all four of them live at home. She does not read nor write, but she is good at managing her business. She describes herself as good businesswoman.

Asatu has a shop business for the past ten years. She works 12 hours day six days a week at her business. Her greatest challenge in business is during the rainy season she hardly gets customers. 

She intends to use this loan to buy more inventory. She started her business with help from her husband, who sells charcoal. She likes her business because it helps buy some items in the home. 

In the future, she wants to own a house.  

She wants to thank the lenders for supporting BRAC Liberia and its borrowers.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her shop.

loans.name: Santiago Enrique

texts.es:
SANTIAGO tiene 58 años de edad es casado tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo y la esposa en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

 SANTIAGO se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, pavos, patos. Solicita el crédito para comprar gallinas, patos, pavos, polvillo, balanceado. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  aumentar los animales para venderlos a un mejor precio. El sueño es tener una granja.

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas o Vinces. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar con el hijo y descansar.
texts.en:
Santiago is 58, married, and has a son. He lives with his son and his wife in Ventanas, Los Rios province. Santiago raises and sells chickens, turkeys and ducks. He is requesting the loan to buy chickens, ducks, turkeys and poultry feed.

With the help of the loan he will be able to increase his number of animals, so that he can sell them at a better price. His dream is to have a farm. He makes his purchases in the city of Ventanas or in Vinces. In his free time he likes to play with his son and rest.

loans.use: To buy chickens, ducks, turkeys and poultry feed.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Adjoa did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Adjoa prepares and sells ‘kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves) in her village of Effutuakwa, near Cape Coast. She has been doing so for about 6 years. She is married to a farmer, and together they have 5 children. Adjoa uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. 

Adjoa will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of maize, which will aid her in improving her overall ‘kenkey’ sales. Adjoa wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of maize for preparing kenkey.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam lives in Msambweni with her husband and school-age children.

Miriam has a sewing workshop in her home. She takes on jobs from her customers who are located in the market district. Her husband helps her in the business. She says that she previously used to sell hens in the market and her husband had been employed but when the sewing business gradually took off, she started working at it full time.

Miriam is requesting this loan to invest in her sewing workshop. She will buy fabric, threads, buttons and other supplies so that she can continue growing and improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: buy fabric, threads, buttons and other supplies

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad, age 42, is an Iraqi client who is married and has two children. Ahmad works hard to provide his family's income by himself. He owns a small business and specializes in selling wood plates used for construction purposes. He has been in this field since 2002 and has gained much experience in dealing with clients and selling the best quality of wood. Ahmad became well known in the neighborhood and now he has four hired employees.

Ahmad is requesting a loan of 1,800 USD. This loan will be used to buy a piece of equipment specialized for cutting wood. Ahmad is aiming to grow more in this field so he may be able to educate his children and provide their needs.

loans.use: to buy a piece of equipment specifically for cutting wood

loans.name: Meshack

texts.en: Meshack finished his first loan without problems and now seeks another loan of 62,650 Kenya shillings to buy engine parts and suspension system. He wants to open a spare parts shop that will serve the whole town.

loans.use: to buy engine parts and suspension system.

loans.name: Mbete

texts.en:
Thanks to her work, Mbete is able to help her daughter finish her studies and pay for all the household needs. She is a dedicated person who has demonstrated that she works hard to meet her obligations.

She is asking for this loan to buy fresh fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, and onions so that she can continue working to meet her goals.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Sebastiao

texts.pt:
Professor de profissão, vive maritalmente há 3 anos e tem 1 filho com apenas 9 anos que está a estudar.
O Sebastião, além da sua profissão, está também a estudar na universidade.

Com o presente empréstimo para habitação irá comprar cimento, chapas de zinco, barrotes e blocos para fazer uma casa de banho.

No futuro deseja terminar os seus estudos e terminar as obras da sua casa.
texts.en:
A teacher by profession, Sebastiao has been cohabitating for three years. He has one child who is just 9 years old and is enrolled in school.  Sebastião, in addition to his profession as a teacher, is also studying at university.

With this housing loan, he will buy cement, corrugated steel, beams and  cinder blocks to make a bathroom.

In the future he wants to finish his studies and complete the construction on his home.

loans.use: to purchase building materials (cement, iron sheets, bars and blocks) to continue the construction of his home.

loans.name: Nayef

texts.en:
Nayef is a 23-year-old single man who has been selling fruits and vegetables since 2004. He was only 14 years old when he started working, because just like almost all of the Palestinian refugees in Lebanon, they had no wide choices of education or businesses in Lebanon.

Nayef dreams of expanding his work and opening a big grocery store of his own in a very good commercial location.

Nayef is taking his first step forward towards business development, through an applied for YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy a new additional carriage and increase his products diversity.

He hopes to open a wide wholesale fruits and vegetables market in the future.

loans.use: to buy a new carriage and diversify his products

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 47 years old and lives in the Paynesville South area of Liberia. It is a suburb of the capital city of Monrovia and one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County.  The area boasts one of the best standards of living in the county with affordable rents, good roads, access to water and lots of transportation options. She is married with seven children between 32 and 10 years old. Only two live at home and are currently attending school. The last grade she finished before getting to a business was first grade. For the past 10 years, she has been selling used clothes in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband. She enjoys her business because the business gives her more money.  She sells six days a week, from 7am to 5pm, and most of the time she uses a taxi to get her goods to her shop. She is requesting a loan to purchase more inventories for her business. Her plans for the future are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more inventories for her business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Although she has received no prior formal education, Esther is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Banku’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made using fermented corn/cassava dough that is mixed proportionally and cooked in hot water into a smooth whitish consistent paste). She usually sells her ‘Banku’ in the Ankaful Prison area (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling ‘Banku’ for four years. Esther is married and has five children. Her husband works as a security guard. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. Esther wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of cassava and maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty ‘Banku’. In the long term, Esther plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of cassava and maize

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma works hard to support her family. Norma is married and has a furniture=making business in the Philippines.

Norma requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional lumber for her business.

Norma has been in this business for nine years now.

In the future, Norma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional lumber for her business

loans.name: Garmai

texts.en: Garmai, 45 years old, operates a table market selling goods such as pepper, bitter ball, okra, etc in the Paynesville South area of Liberia.  It is a suburb of the capital city of Monrovia and one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County.  The area boasts one of the best standards of living in the county with affordable rents, good roads, access to water and lots of transportation options. She is a married with six children between 22 and 16 years old, who are living at home with her. Only three are currently attending school. The last grade she finished before getting to business is second grade. For the past 10 years, she has been selling pepper, bitter ball, okra, etc in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and she enjoys her business because the business gives her more money.  She sells six days a week, from 7 am to 6 pm, and most of the time she uses a shared taxi to get her goods to her shop. She is requesting a loan to purchase more inventories for her business. Her plan is to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more inventories for her business.

loans.name: Mohbegim

texts.ru: Мохбегим проживает в столице Таджикистана в городе Душанбе. Она 54-летняя вдова, у нее один сын и дочь. Мохбегим имеет намерение открыть лепёшечную пекарню. Она считает, что это хороший вариант семейного бизнеса и к тому же хлеб - это такой продукт, который востребован всегда независимо от времени года или других обстоятельств. Таким образом во дворе своего дома Мохбегим уже построила пекарню и снабдила необходимыми принадлежностями. Теперь ей необходимо заполучить разрешительные документы у местных властей и закупить сырье для производства лепешки. Чтобы реализовать свою цель она обратилась за кредитом. В этом бизнесе ей будут помогать сын, дочь и зять. Дополнительно она будет нанимать двух рабочих. Мохбегим планирует производить в день 1500 лепешек. С помощью этого бизнеса она увеличит семейный доход и условия проживания ее семьи улучшится.
texts.en: Mohbegim lives in the in city of Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. She is a 54-year-old widow with one son and one daughter. Mohbegim intends to open a flat bread bakery. She believes that this is a good option for a family business because bread is a product that is always in demand, regardless of the time of year or other circumstances. Thus, Mohbegim has already built an oven in her yard and has procured necessary accessories. Now, she must obtain permits from the local authorities and purchase the raw materials for producing flat bread. In order to achieve her goal, she has applied for a loan. Her son, daughter and son-in-law will help her with the business. In addition, she will also hire two workers. Mohbegim plans to produce 1,500 flat breads per day. With the help of this business, she would increase her family's income and her family's living conditions would improve.

loans.use: To obtain permits to open a bakery and to purchase raw materials

loans.name: Fernando Alberto

texts.es: Fernando de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que el realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles; él es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo responsable y honesto, Fernando esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi el  podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en: Fernando is 36, lives at home with his wife and two children, he has a dress making shop located at his residence, where he makes different items, recently he has made many new customers because he does an excellent job and sells at accessible prices.  He is a hard-working, responsible and honest man, Fernando is requesting  a loan that will allow him to buy fabrics, threads, needles and everything related with dress making, this way he can continue to meet his clients' needs and have a better quality of life with his family.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, needles, etc.

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
A Lina tem 57 anos de idade, é viúva e tem 1 filha maior de idade. Além da filha, sustenta também 1 sobrinho que vive com ela.
A Lina é comerciante e vende os seus produtos no mercado. Ela vende principalmente coco, que compra em Inhambane e fraldas descartáveis que compra na Suazilândia. Com o presente empréstimo para comércio irá comprar mais destes produtos para reforçar o seu negócio.
No futuro deseja ver o seu negocio crescer.
texts.en:
Lina is 57 years old, a widow and has one adult daughter.  Apart from her daughter, she supports one nephew who lives with her.
Lina is a merchant and sells her products in the local market. She mainly sells coconut, and in the nearby city of Inhambane, she buys bulk sold disposable diapers from Swaziland.  With this loan for her business, she will buy more of these products to enhance her business stock.
In the future, she wants to see her business grow.

loans.use: to buy more products wholesale (disposable diapers and cocoa) for her resale in the local market.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: Oscar de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, y desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maiz y maicillo, con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía, pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en: Oscar, 34, lives in his own home with his wife and their two children. For many years he has worked as a farmer, which is his main source of income. He plants corn and sorghum, and is able to cover their household expenses with the profits from his harvests. He wants to buy the inputs needed for his crops like compost, fertilizers, seeds as well as to improve the land where he plants, which is shown in the photograph. He doesn't have the financial resources to make the investment in the inputs that he needs, so he has decided to ask for a loan which is the only way he will be able to continue with the planting process. Like all farmers, he puts his faith in agriculture because he doesn't have another source of income and he wants to improve himself, doing the best that he can possibly do with his crops. He hopes to get an abundant harvest so that he can keep bringing home the daily bread and pay back his loan.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, seeds and to improve his land.

loans.name: Yanina Margarita

texts.es:
Doña Yanina es originaria de la cuidad de la flores Masaya, ciudad conocida por contar con las fiestas patronales mas larga de todo el país. Tiene 50 años de edad, es soltera, su núcleo familiar lo compone ella y sus dos hijos, a quienes a sacado adelante con su esfuerzo y trabajo, es comerciante con 11 años de tener su negocio.

Su Negocio consiste en la venta de ropa usada y nueva,ropa de todo tipo, para todas las edades, tanto para damas y caballeros, la forma de vender su producto es ambulante en el mercado municipal, aparte que en su vivienda también ella pone a  la venta los productos que ofrece.

 Sus compras la realiza en mercado oriental de Managua, cuidad a la que tiene que viajar para adquirir su producto

En estos momentos necesita invertir en la remodelación del lugar donde tiene  su  negocio ya que parte de la madera que sostiene el techo  se lo comieron las polillas y otras mejoras que necesita para crear las condiciones necesarias en atención a sus clientes.

 Es por esta razón  para solicitando un financiamiento en la que  compra Arena mostatepe, clavos, piedras, bloques 6”, hierro 3/8 y ¼, cemento, tablas, alambre de amarre, perlin, zinc y la mano de obra, con el único fin de continuar comercializando la ropa y cubrir la demanda de los clientes en un lugar digno de sus clientes y su familia.
texts.en:
Yanina is originally from the city of flowers Masaya, city known for having the largest religious celebrations in the country.  She is 50, single, and her family is formed by her and her two children, whom she has gotten ahead with her effort and work, she is a storekeeper with 11 years in the business.

Her business consists of the sale of any types of used clothing, all sizes and ages, for men and women, she is a vendor at the city market, in addition, she also sells products from her residence.

She makes her purchases at the Asian market of Managua, city where she has to travel to purchase her products.

She currently needs to invest in the renovation of her store, because the wood that keeps the roof up is infested by woodworms, as well as other improvements she needs to make to serve her customers.

This is why she is requesting a loan to buy sand, nails, stones, concrete blocks, iron, cement, wood, tie wire, purlin, zinc and to pay for labor, with the goal to continue selling clothes and meet the demand from her customers at a location  that her clients and her family deserve.

loans.use: to buy sand, nails, stones, concrete blocks, iron, cement, wood, tie wire, purlin, zinc and to pay for labor to renovate her business.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana tiene 42 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo y unos familiares en el Cantón Ventanas. 

Ana  se dedica al comercio de prendas de vestir. Solicita el crédito para comprar calentadores, suéteres, pantalones.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hace falta para poder vender a los clientes. 

El sueño es  tener una boutic. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y enseñarle las tareas a los hijos.
texts.en: Ana, 42, is single and has one son. She lives with him and some relatives in the canton of Ventanas. Ana sells clothing. She is asking for a loan to buy sweatshirts, sweaters, and pants. With the help of the loan she will be able to buy what she lacks so that she can sell it to her customers.

loans.use: to buy sweatshirts, sweaters and pants.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.pt:
O Eduardo tem 29 anos de idade, é solteiro e vive com a sua mãe e os seus filhos em casa da sua mãe. Ele tem dois filhos: um está a estudar e o outro ainda é pequeno.
O Eduardo é professor da escola primária e com o seu rendimento sustenta tanto os seus filhos como a sua mãe.
Com o presente empréstimo para habitação irá comprar cimento, areia e pedra para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa, que começou a construir com os créditos anteriores da Hluvuku.
No futuro deseja terminar a sua obra e mobilar a casa.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 29 years old, single and lives with his mother and his children at his mother's house. He has two sons, one is studying in school and the other is still too young for school.
Eduardo is a primary school teacher and with his income he sustains both is mother and his children.
With this housing loan, he will buy cement, sand and stone to continue the construction of his home. He already began to build his home with the previous loans from Hluvuku.
In the future, he wants to finish the construction and furnish the home.

loans.use: to purchase building materials (cement, sand and stone) to continue the construction of his home.

loans.name: Boyukxan

texts.en: Boyukxan is an IDP (internally displaced person) from Lachin. Now he lives in Baku region with his family. Boyukxan is 21 years old, married, and has a child. His daughter is one year old. His wife stays at home, so he is the only one making an income. He wants his daughter to become a painter. He started his business two years ago to sell children's shoes. But now he wants to sell not only shoes but clothes too. Now Boyukxan needs a 2,000 AZN loan to buy children's clothing. He wants to use the money for the future of his family. In the future, Boyukxan wants to have a bigger store for resale. This will be more profitable for his business. Boyukxan is thankful to Komak and Kiva for supporting him.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing

loans.name: Darlyng Margarita

texts.es:
Doña Darlyng pertenece al municipio de  Niquinohomo, municipio que fue elegido para el programa de creación de alianzas para el fortalecimiento de las capacidades locales para el saneamiento de Nicaragua, es soltera, con  31 años de edad, asalariada trabajadora de zona franca  con  ingreso  bajo,  con un cargo de menor rango. 
Su núcleo familiar lo conforman su madre, su hermana  es menor de edad y estudiante, a quien apoya actualmente para que siga estudiando.

En este momento están aplicando para el proyecto de agua y saneamiento, a través de  un financiamiento para   instalar un  sistema sanitario Econosan 1 que consiste en la instalación de un inodoro convencional con la construcción de sistema de tratamiento de efluentes (un tanque séptico 1,100 lts), esto lo requiere  ya que por donde ella habita no es posible el acceso a aguas negras, por lo que para su uso la familia cuenta con una  letrina, siendo su familia una de la miles que no tienen acceso al  saneamiento mejorado, con este proyecto que esta beneficiando a varios municipios del país, le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida  y  también contribuir con el medio ambiente. 
Sin la oportunidad de este crédito es imposible que Darlyng tenga acceso a un inodoro ya que es muy costoso. Con su bajo salario es imposible que logre instalar, estos programas vienen ayudar a familias en condiciones mas pobres, las letrinas causan enfermedades y contaminan el medio ambiente, es por ello que nace la idea de crear estas soluciones dirigidas al sector más pobres.
texts.en:
Darlyng is from of the municipality of Niquinohomo, a town that was chosen for a program to create partnerships in order to strengthen local capacities for sanitation in Nicaragua. 

She is single and is 31 years old. She works in a free trade zone and has a low income and a low-ranking position. Her family consists of her mother and her younger sister, who is a student. Darlyng currently supports her so that she can continue studying.

At this time, she is applying to be a part of the water and sanitation project through a loan to install an Econosan 1 sanitary system. This consists of installing a conventional toilet with the construction of a sewage treatment system (a 1,100 liter septic tank). 

She needs it because where she lives, there is no access for sewage, so her family has to use a latrine. Being that her family is one of thousands who do not have access to improved sanitation, through this project that is benefiting several municipalities in the country, she will be able to improve her quality of life and also contribute to the environment. 

Without the opportunity of this loan, it would be impossible for Darlyng to have access to a toilet, because it is very expensive. With her low salary, it would not be possible for her to install one; these programs help families in the most dire of conditions. Latrines cause diseases and contaminate the environment, and due to this, the idea of creating these solutions directed toward the poorest sectors was born.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the construction and installation of a sanitation unit, such as sand, molding sand, cement, a septic tank, plastic, crushed rock, a toilet and its accessories, etc.

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru:
Джахонгир кредитуется второй раз. Он честный человек и имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Джахонгир более 2 лет работает в органе суда своего района. Он работает секретарем в суде. Джахонгир использует для покупки продуктов питания для содержания семьи. 
Джахонгиру 21 год и он еще не женат. Их в семье 4 детей. Джахонгир помогает своим родителям по обеспечения семьи. Он хочет купить компьютер, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки компьютера. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Jahongir is taking out a loan for the second time. He is an honest man and has a good credit history. Jahongir has been working in the justice department of his region for over two years. He works as a secretary in court. Jahongir is using the income to buy food and support his family.

He is 21 years old and not married yet. There are four children in his family. Jahongir helps his parents to support the family. He wants to buy a computer, but does not have money. He is asking for a loan in the amount of 1,000 somoni to buy a computer. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy computer for himself.

loans.name: Perpetua Elizabeth

texts.es:
Perpetua tiene 51 años de edad es viuda tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos y el nieto en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de Ventanas.

Perpetua trabaja en una institución privada cómo conserje mensajero.  Solicita el crédito para pagar deuda. Con la ayuda del  crédito podrá pagar la deuda en farmacia. El sueño es seguir trabajando. 

El pago de la deuda la realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar con el nieto.
texts.en:
Perpetua is 51 years old and a widow with two children.  She lives with her children and grandson in the Ventanas canton, of the Ventanas province.

Peretua works for a private organisation as a messenger.  She is applying for a loan to pay off her debt.  With the help of this loan, Perpetua will be able to pay of her debt at the pharmacy and, then, her dream is to continue working.

Perpetua will pay off the debt in the city of Ventanas.  In her spare time, she likes to play with her grandson.

loans.use: to pay her debt.

loans.name: Muzafar

texts.ru: Музафар образованный и интеллигентный человек. Он женат и имеет 4 детей. Музафар все годы своей карьерной деятельности работает в школе. Он учитель истории. Музафар является основным кормильцем в семье, так как его жена домохозяйка. Музафар планирует скоро провести мероприятие в семье и пригласить много гостей, но он не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 сомони для проведения мероприятия. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muzafar is an educated and intelligent man. He is married and has four children. Muzafar has been working all his professional years in school. He is a history teacher. Muzafar is the main provider in his family and his wife is a homemaker. Muzafar plans to hold a party in his family and invite many guests, but does not have money. He is asking for a loan in the amount of 1,200 to hold the party. He awaits for your kindness.

loans.use: to hold a party in his family.

loans.name: Pablo Emilio

texts.es:
Condega  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Estelí, conocido como tierra de alfareros por su artesanía y gente trabajadora. Vive el señor pablo en una comunidad aledaña, con su esposa y dos hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios, de profesión agricultor en granos básicos y la ganadería en una pequeña escala.

Conocido como una persona honesta y trabajadora tiene una propiedad de 19 manzanas de extensión con diferentes tipos de aéreas para la explotación agrícola y ganadera.

Recientemente visitó la oficina de ceprodel  y está solicitando un crédito para un pre ajuste en la compra de un terreno agrícola de doce manzanas, donde piensa salir beneficiado y poder aumentar sus áreas de siembra y repasto de su hato ganadero ya que carece de esta área en un buen porcentaje. 


El lleva varios créditos y tiene ocho años de trabajar con Ceprodel. El impacto y beneficios que tiene él y su familia son de una forma positiva, ya que tendrán una finca con una mayor área de producción  agrícola y ganadera que les permitirá mejorar  sus condiciones económicas con los ingresos obtenidos.
texts.en:
Condega is a town in north of the Estelí department, and is known as a land of potters because of its artisan products, and for its hard-working people.  Here, Pablo lives in a neighbouring community, with his wife and two children, whom he must support and provide with an education.  Pablo is a small-scale farmer, growing basic grains and raising cattle

Known as an honest and hard-working person, Pablo has around thirty acres of land with sections for cattle and growing crops.

Pablo recently came to visit the Ceprodel office and is applying for a loan to pay the deposit on some twenty acres of land.  On this new land, Pablo hopes to benefit by increasing the area used for his crops and the pastures for his herd of cattle.  He does not currently have much space for the cattle.

Pablo has had various loans and has been working with Ceprodel for eight years.  The impact and benefits of these loans have been very positive for Pablo and his family.  They will now have a farm with a larger area for farming production and cattle and this will allow them to improve their financial situation with the income they will earn.

loans.use: to pay the deposit on some twenty acres of land.

loans.name: Yadira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Yadira, es originaria del municipio Nandasmo perteneciente al departamento de Masaya, ella es casada y tiene 50 años de edad,  tiene su propio negocio desde hace siete años, su núcleo familiar lo compone su esposo, sus tres hijos y ella. 

Yadira posee una pulpería, la cual consiste en vender productos  como golosinas, gaseosas, refrescos,  granos básicos, productos de uso personal, entre otros, el negocio esta ubicado  en su vivienda por lo que diariamente ella se encarga de entender a sus clientes que son vecinos del mismo barrio. 

Para re abastecer su negocio ella viaja a Masaya al mercado municipal y el resto les compra a las empresas que llegan a su negocio. Menciona que también es propietaria de dos unidades de transporte como lo son moto taxi, y que como mujer y madre se siente satisfecha de lo que ella realiza porque siente que a salido adelante con la ayuda de Dios. 

Actualmente esta solicitando un financiamiento para invertir en su negocio ya que para estas fechas se mejoran las ventas y para atender bien a su clientela necesita variedad de productos y poder cubrir con la demanda.

 Con este crédito  surtirá su negocio con compra de arroz faizan, arroz 80/20, frijol, aceite, queso, pollo, gaseosas y jugos, cajas de jabones, salsa naturas, tan, harina, papel higiénico nevax, palo No.9, vasos No. 6, cucharas, chiclin, pasta Colgate, café toro, Ritz queso, leche nido 360,  toalla sanitaria leche y café presto;
Considera que este crédito le ayudara a incrementar sus ventas y mejorar su cálida de vida.
texts.en:
Yadira is originally from the town in Nandasmo, in the Masaya deparment.  She is 50 years old and married.  She has a family: a husband and three children.  She has had her own business for seven years.

Yadira has a grocery store where she sells products such as sweets, fizzy drinks, juices, basic grains and personal items.  She runs the business out of her home and tends to her customers every day.  Her customers are her neighbours from the barrio.

In order to stock-up her business, Yadira travels to the market in Masaya.  Everything else that she needs, she buys from businesses that come to her town.  Yadira also tells us that she also owns two mototaxis and, as a woman and a mother, she is satisfied with her work because she feels she has prospered with God's help.

Yadira is now applying for a loan to invest in her business, so as to improve her sales and tend to her customers' needs.  Yadira needs a variety of products and then she will be able to satisfy demand.

Yadira will use this loan to stock-up her business with Faisán rice, 80/20 rice, beans, oil, cheese, chicken, fizzy drinks and juices, soaps, sauces, flour, toilet paper, cups, spoons, chewing-gum, Colgate toothpaste, Toto coffee, Ritz cheese, milk, sanitary towels and Presto coffee.

Yadira believes that his loan will help increase her sales and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy Faisán rice, 80/20 rice, beans, oil, cheese, chicken, fizzy drinks and juices, soaps, sauces, flour, toilet paper, cups, spoons, chewing-gum, Colgate toothpaste, Toto coffee, Ritz cheese, milk, sanitary towels and Presto coffee.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: El Sr. Guillermo, es casado tiene 2 hijos con su esposa, vive en el municipio de Juigalpa, se desempeña en una institución de Tecnología Agropecuaria, este es su único medio de ingresos para mantener a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para realizar un anexo de 14vrs cuadradas en su casa de habitación ya que su hija tiene 15 años y se ve con la necesidad de construirle su propia habitación, es por eso que acude al medio de financiamiento para que sea posible cumplir con su proyecto.
texts.en: Guillermo is married and has two children with his wife.  He lives in the town of Juigalpa and works for a farming organisation, his only source of income to support the family.  Guillermo is applying for a loan in order to add a 14m2 extension to his home, as his daughter is now 15 years old and needs her own room.  So, Guillermo has applied for a loan in order to make this project possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron and bricks.

loans.name: Huriniso

texts.ru: Хуринисо женщина, которая имеет «золотые руки». Ей 22 года. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка, которому 5 месяца. Так как ее брак оказался не удачным, она развелась и данное время живет с матерью и братом. Хуринисо после развода поставила себе цель сделать успешную карьеру. Она очень умелая портниха. Хуринисо умеет шить национальные платья, а также национальный матрас «курпача». Она старается шить платья с новыми фасонами и с высоким качеством. Благодаря хорошему сервису, она обладает постоянными клиентами. Хуринисо хочет развевать свой бизнес и с такой целью она обратилась за займом в сумме 700 сомони для покупки разнообразных тканей. Будущим она мечтает открыть свой швейный цех. Она ждет вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en: Huriniso is a woman who has "golden hands." She is 22 years old. She is divorced and has one child who is five months old. Because her marriage turned out to be unsuccessful, she has divorced and at this time lives with her mother and brother. Huriniso has put forth a goal to have a successful career after her divorce. She is a very handy seamstress. Huriniso can sew traditional dresses and also a national mattress called kurpacha. She tries to sew the dresses with new styles and high quality. Thanks to her good service she has regular customers. Huriniso wants to grow her business and with this goal she has come for a loan in the amount of 700 somoni to buy different kinds of fabrics. In the future she dreams to open her own sewing shop. She awaits for your kindness and promises to pay off the loan on time.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew traditional women dresses.

loans.name: Deemah

texts.en:
This is 46-year-old Deemah from Liberia.  She resides in Paynesville South, a suburb just outside Monrovia.  The area is one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County with one of the best standards of living in the country. Good roads, access to clean water, affordable rents, and plentiful transportation options makes Paynesville South one of the most popular places to live. 

Deemah is married with four children, between the ages of 20 and 7.  Three of her children currently are attending school, and they all living with her in her home. 

She runs a business selling charcoal. She describes herself as a serious business woman. She started her business 15 years ago, using money given to her husband. Typically, she works from 7am to 6pm from Monday to Saturday at her business and transports her goods to her business by bus.  She cites her greatest challenge as having small capital.  She is proud of her business because it supports her home.

Using the proceeds of this loan, she intends to purchase more inventory for her business. In the future, she plans to build her house and educate her children. She sincerely thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 36 years old and married with four children.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more grocery items to sell like canned goods, biscuits, egg, noodles, spices, etc.

Teresita has borrowed and paid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Teresita aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to sell like canned goods, biscuits, egg, noodles, spices, etc.

loans.name: Marat

texts.en: Marat lives in Ijevan with his wife, two sons, and retired mother. Marat’s wife works as a teacher, his elder son is married and lives separately with his wife's family, and the other is a student at the Medical University. Marat for many years has worked in different jobs, and he used to have various positions, but the last few years he has been fully engaged in bee keeping, which he says is a very profitable business, and he intends to enlarge it. So he is asking for a loan of 680,000 Armenian drams to buy ten new beehives. Marat has already once taken a loan from Nor Horizon, and he has managed to pay it back successfully without any delays.

loans.use: to buy ten new beehives

loans.name: Hermanos En Cristo Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Angela mujer de 50 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos y  desde hace 14 años se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como prendas zafiros, ropa nueva, ropa de cama,  ropa interior, anteriormente vendía haciendo rifas en su comunidad, la hecha y ventas de tortillas tiene 12 años de ser clientes de la institución con más de 15 ciclos consecutivos quien ha demostrado ser muy puntual en sus pagos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de zafiro como anillos, cadenas, pulseras de mano, pulseras de pie, ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, zapatos de damas, zapatos de varón, ropa de cama, ropa interior damas, camisas de damas, camisetas de varón, bóxer de varón etc., Merling tiene 29 años de edad su negocio es la venta de prendas de zafiros y cosméticos de la Avon y Maricela tiene 26 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida.
texts.en:
This group is formed by three members who are successful entrepreneurs. One of the members is Angela, who is 50 years old, married, and has three children. For 14 years now she has worked selling various merchandise, such as sapphire jewelry, new clothing, bedclothes and underwear. Previously she held raffles and sold raffle tickets in her community, as well as making and selling tortillas. The members of the group have been clients of the field partner for 12 years with more than 15 consecutive loan cycles, which they say shows they are punctual with their payments.

Angela is requesting a loan to buy sapphire jewelry such as rings, chains, wrist bracelets and ankle bracelets; and to buy clothing such as men’s and women’s pants, men’s and women’s shoes, bedclothes, men’s and women’s underwear, women’s shirts, men’s t-shirts, etc.

Merling is 29 years old and her business is selling sapphire jewelry and Avon cosmetics. Maricela is 26 years old and her business is selling food.

loans.use: to buy sapphire jewelry such as rings, chains, wrist bracelets and ankle bracelets; and to buy clothing such as men’s and women’s pants, men’s and women’s shoes, bedclothes, men’s and women’s underwear, women’s shirts, men’s t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Moises Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es María mujer de 36 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos, 11, 8, 4 y 14 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de comida en su domicilio, vende papelería para cybers y artículos de librerías, de estar en la institución tiene 1 año, su hija mayor y la cliente  se encargan de administrar el negocio , el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de resma de papel, folders tamaño carta, folders tamaño legal, grapa, selladores, sobres de manilas, marcadores de diferentes colores, resaltadores de diferentes colores, además tiene un negocio colateral que es de bridar servicio de fotocopia en su domicilio. Gabriela tiene 27 años de edad  y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Johana tiene 33 años su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group has three members, one of whom is 36-year-old María.  She has a partner and four children, aged fourteen, eleven, eight and four years old.  She has a business selling food from her home and sells stationery products.  María has been with the communal bank for a year and she manages her business with the help of her eldest daughter.  María will use this loan to buy stationery products, such as reams of paper, different folders, staples, envelopes, markers and highlighters of different colours, and more.  In addition, María has a shared-business, offering photocopying services from her home.  Gabriela is 27 years old and has a business selling new clothes while thirty-three year old Johana has grocery store that she runs out of her home.

loans.use: to buy stationery products, such as reams of paper, different folders, staples, envelopes, markers and highlighters of different colours, and more.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.pt:
O Isidro é casado e pai de 4 filhos que estão a estudar na escola primária e secundária. Além dos seus filhos, sustenta também a sua mãe.
O Isidro trabalha como professor e ao mesmo tempo estuda na universidade.

O presente empréstimo para habitação será aplicado na compra de materiais de construção (cimento, chapas de zinco, areia e pedra) para ampliar a sua casa.
No futuro deseja terminar os seus estudos, a construção de sua casa e oficializar a sua relação, casando.
Ira continuar a fazer pedidos de empréstimo para satisfazer os seus planos.
texts.en:
Isidro is married and has four children who are studying in primary and secondary school. Besides his children, he also supports his mother.
Isidro works as a teacher while studying at university.

This housing loan will be applied to the purchase of construction materials (cement, corrugated metal and sand) to extend his home.
In the future, he wants to finish his studies, the construction on his house and to formalize his relationship by marrying.
He will continue to make loan applications to realize his plans.

loans.use: to purchase building materials (cement, corrugated iron and sand) to extend his home.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga es una mujer de 28 años de edad joven, luchadora y emprendedora en su negocio en compañía de su pareja y sus 2 hijos. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria no completado cursado hasta el 3 grado el cual no pudo terminar por falta de apoyo económico por parte de sus padres los cuales han sido agricultores desde toda una vida. Fueron ellos los que le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra (cultivo de café) desde muy pequeña y en compañía de su pareja lo practica hace más de 6 años ya que este rubro es el único medio de ingreso para sus padres y actualmente para su familia. Las tierras que ella en compañía de su pareja cultivan son propias gracias a una herencia por parte de sus padres las cuales están ubicadas a 1.5 kilómetros de distancia de su casa de habitación.

Dominga solicita ayuda para la compra de abono, foliares y fertilizantes para sus cultivos de café los cuales ayudaran a proteger la planta y fortalecer las raíces y el grano en su totalidad. 

Sus deseos y sueños en primer lugar es ver crecer a sus hijos con una carrera profesional a nivel universitario para que puedan heredar la tierra que hoy en día sus padres trabajan formando un patrimonio para ellos. Sus metas son comprar un pedazo más de tierra para poder cultivar más producto en variedad y ofrecer a sus compradores locales e intermediarios.
texts.en:
Dominga is 28 years old and lives with her partner and two children. She has a fighting and enterprising spirit. She went to primary school up to the third grade, but she was not able to finish because her parents did not have enough economic resources. Her parents have been farmers all of their lives. They taught her how to work the land and grow coffee since she was very young. She has grown coffee with her partner now for six years, because this area of work is the only source of income for her parents and also at the moment for her family. The land she and her partner cultivate is their own, having inherited it from their parents. Their land is located 1.5 kilometers from the house where they live.

Dominga is requesting a loan to buy different types of fertilizer for her coffee crops. These fertilizers will help protect the plants and strengthen the roots and beans.

Dominga’s principal dream is seeing her children grow up with professional careers from a university. She would like them to inherit the land that today their family works and that forms part of their inheritance. Her goal is to buy another piece of land to be able to grow a wider variety of products to offer to local buyers and intermediaries.

loans.use: to buy different types of fertilizer for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.pt:
De 31 anos de idade, agente de serviço e pedreiro nas horas livres, vive maritalmente há 10 anos em casa própria com a sua família. Tem 3 filhos: 2 deles estudam e 1 ainda é menor. Além dos filhos sustenta também 1 sobrinho orfão de pai. 	
Com o presente empréstimo para habitação irá comprar cimento, chapas de zinco, barrotes e blocos para cobrir a casa e parte do material para fazer um muro.
No futuro deseja terminar os seus estudos (nível médio), ingressar numa faculdade e arranjar um emprego seguro.
texts.en:
Daniel is a 31-year-old service agent and builder in his spare time. He has been cohabitating for ten years with his family. He has three children, two of them are studying and one is still too young for school. Besides his children, he also supports an orphaned nephew.
With this housing loan, he will buy cement, corrugated metal, beams and blocks to cover the house and some material to build a wall.
In the future, he wants to finish his education (secondary level), enroll in college and get a secure job.

loans.use: to purchase building materials (cement, corrugated metal, beams and  cinder blocks) to cover the house and make a wall.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Even though Mary grew up in poverty without an education, this has not stopped her from fulfilling her dream of achieving a better life for herself and her family. Currently, Mary is an entrepreneur. She prepares and sells ‘Banku’ for a living (a traditional Ghanaian dish made using fermented corn/cassava dough that is mixed proportionally and cooked in hot water into a smooth whitish consistent paste). She primarily sells her ‘Banku’ in Effutuakwa (near Cape Coast). 

Her business enterprise has grown substantially since she began 4 years ago. She uses the income from her business to help her husband raise their 6 children. Mary has identified that there are growing demands among consumers for her ‘Banku’. Nevertheless she is unable to meet their needs due to a limited inventory. Thus she aims to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of maize and cassava, therefore helping her to prepare more of her tasty ‘Banku’. 

With the new profits from her expanded business, Mary wants to buck the trend by ensuring that all her children will be given the opportunity to further distance their family from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize and cassava, therefore helping her to prepare more of her tasty ‘Banku’.

loans.name: Grecelda

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Grecelda works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling firewood. Grecelda is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase more items like canned goods, biscuits, snack foods, sugar, eggs, etc. to sell in her general store.

Grecelda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, biscuits, snack foods, sugar, eggs, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Naem

texts.en:
Naem is from Iraq. He is 34 years old, married and has 2 children. Naem is the sole provider for the family. He owns a small grocery store where he sells fruits, vegetables, canned food, snacks, drinks and dairy products. He has gained his experience through previously working with his uncle at his grocery store. In 2009, Naem established his own business and now he has hired an employee. Naem is well-known in his neighborhood.

He is requesting a loan of 2,400 USD. He will use this loan to renovate his grocery store and to install an external ceiling. Naem is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may take better care of his family.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store and to install an external ceiling.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
34-year-old Marie operates a shop selling rice and soup in the Paynesville South area of Liberia.  It is a suburb of the capital city of Monrovia and one of the most populated areas in Montserrado County. The area boasts one of the best standards of living in the county with affordable rents, good roads, access to water and lots of transportation options.
 
She is married and has 7 children, between 24 and 18. One is currently attending school and lives at home.  She completed grade 8 before starting her business.  She describes herself as a good business woman.

Marie has had a cook shop business for the past three years. She works 8 hours six days a week at her business. Her greatest challenge in business is the rainy season. She intends to use the loan to buy food ingredients such as pepper, fish, meat, vita, oil, etc. She started her business with help from her husband.  She likes her business because she has many customers. 

In the future, Marie wants to own a house. She wants to thank the lenders for supporting BRAC Liberia and its borrowers.

loans.use: to use the loan to buy food ingredients such as pepper, fish, meat, vita, oil, etc.

loans.name: Abenaa

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Abenaa is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough and wrapped in banana leaves). She usually sells her ‘Kenkey’ in Effutuakwa (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ for 6 years. 

Abenaa is married and has 2 children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. She wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty ‘Kenkey’. In the long term, Abenaa plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Las Guadalupanas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por seis socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Luisa  mujer de 32 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos de 13, 10, 9 y 5 años de edad, desde hace 10 años tiene su negocio en la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, de ser clientes de la institución tiene dos años ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, su hijo mayor y ella le ayuda en la comercialización de cosméticos este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos como perfume de varón,  perfume de dama, delineadores, pinturas de uñas, pinturas de labios, máscaras, crema para mano, crema para pies, crema faciales, cremas para cuerpos, ropa nueva como  pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisas de varón, camisetas de varón, blusas, chores de varón, etc. Hazel tiene 26 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, Virginia tiene 28 años de edad su negocio es la venta de repuestos automotriz, Noemí tiene 60 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de fritanga, hielo, gaseosas variadas, jugos en caja, jugos en latas, María tiene 63 años de edad su negocio es la venta de comida, gaseosas variadas, refrescos naturales, nacatamales, hielo y helados, y Angela tiene 52 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos, líquidos ambientadores, ropa usada.
texts.en:
This group consists of six entrepreneurial members and one of them is Luisa who is 32 years old, in a relationship, and has four children aged 13, 10, 9 and five. Luisa has been working for 10 years selling Avon cosmetics and has been a client of this microfinance institution for two years where she has proven to be responsible in paying back her loans. Her oldest son helps her with the marketing of the cosmetics.

This loan will be invested in cosmetics such as perfumes for men and women, eyeliner, nail-polish, lipstick, facial masks, hand cream, foot cream, facial cream, body lotion, new clothes such as men's and women's pants, shirts, t-shirts, tops, shorts, etc. 

Hazel is 26 years old and works selling new clothes; Virginia is 28 years old and works selling automotive parts; Noemi is 60 years old and works selling foods, ice, soft drinks, and juices; Maria is 63 years old and works selling foods, soft drinks, juices, nacatamales [a Nicaraguan dish], ice, and ice cream; and Angela is 52 years old and works selling cosmetics, air fresheners, and second hand clothing.

loans.use: to invest in cosmetics such as perfumes for men and women, eyeliner, nail-polish, lipstick, facial masks, hand cream, foot cream, facial cream, body lotion, new clothes such as men's and women's pants, shirts, t-shirts, tops, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years. She earns more income from motorcycle transport.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy additional stocks of ingredients for her food vending business.

Rosalinda dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Winque

texts.en:
Winque is 25 years old and single. She works very hard to provide for herself. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

Winque has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, coffee, canned goods, soft-drinks, etc. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Yaw

texts.en:
